40025031	“Ulusika lwe saasila Umwana va Umunu mundolo sakwe, iva pamwi na avanyivaha mbevali avelu, pepene pesaateng'emala mukigoda cha indolo sakwe.
40025032	Avanu mbevali savakong'ana kulumwene, nave saavabagula fipinga fivili ndawe umunyakukwamila lweaibagula ing'olo na imene.
40025033	Ing'olo kwiwoko ilya kundyo, neke imene kwiwoko lyakwe ilya kung'igi.
40025034	Neke umutwa saatigila kwa vala avali kwiwoko ilya kundyo: ‘Muse nyevafunyilile na Dada; mwanukile Uwutwa uwewuvike uluhuma ukuvikwa ulutu ulwa ing'i.
40025035	Pakuva pende na nzala mwamelye ikilyo; pende ng'elwike mwamelye ululenga; pende mugenzi mwanzanuche;
40025036	pende wufuula mwafwikite; pende mutamwa mwaasile ukundava; pende mudindile mwaasile ukundava.’
40025037	Neke avagolofu iwo savamupitula, ‘Mutwa panili petwakuwene veve wina nzala neke tukupele ulye, na peweukelwike neke tukupele ululenga?
40025038	Kangi panili petwakuwene wimugenzi neke tukwanukile na pe wewufuula neke tukufwike?
40025039	Kangi panili petwakuwene veve wimutamwa pe wemudindile neke tuuse ukukulava?
40025040	Neke Umutwa saavapitula: ‘Nachene nguvalongela ndawe lwe mwamupije uyumwi va avadodo vangu iva ulo mwamije nene.’ ”
40025041	“Ipo pe saavatigila vala avali kwiwoko ilya kung'igi: ‘Muhege kwa nene nyevakotofu! Mubite kumoto umuvikile setani na vanyivaha vakwe.
40025042	Pakuva pende na nzala simwamelii ikilyo na pende ng'elwike simwamelii nywe.
40025043	Pende mugenzi simwanzanuchi; pende wufuula simwafwikiti, pende mutamwa na pende mudindile simwandafili.’
40025044	Pepene pe savamupitula: ‘Mutwa panili pe twakuwene veve winanzala nave ukelwike na pe wewimugenzi nave pewewufuula nape wewimutamwa nape we wimudindile neke tulemwe ukukupigila?’
40025045	Neke umwene saavapitula: ‘Nachene nguvalongela, pala pemwalemilwe ukumupigila is uyumwi va avadodo vangu iva, pepene pemwalemilwe ukumigila nene.’
40025046	Na iwo savabita kuluhigilo lwa mbepali neke avagolofu ku wumi wa mbepali.”
40026001	Neke baho Yesu avelige isinda ukulonga ing'ani mbesili ndawe avatigilige avanyigendo vakwe,
40026002	“Mukulukagula ukutigila fisige filo fivili swe ukufika i pasaka na Umwana va Umunu atawulwa atumbikwe mu musalaba.”
40026003	Ndawe avatambisi avavina na avavaha va avanu vakong'ine kukaye yu mutambisi umuvina ilitawa lyakwe Kayafa.
40026004	Swe vivanga ukugaha ifigaho sambi vamwibate Yesu kwa kinyele vamuwulage.
40026005	Neke pevatigile lulava pa ikimunyi ikikomi cha ipasaka, kulonga kuve naliyowo mu vanu.
40026006	Lino Yesu pee ku Betaniya kukaye ya Simoni umunya wukoma,
40026007	umung'inetu uyumwi ahegelye kwa Yesu akolye isupa yeyeyina mafuta ga amagobole amolofu, ndawe amuhululisige Yesu amafuta mu mutwe pealisige
40026008	Neke avanyigendo vakwe pevaluwene ulu swe vivipa vitigila, “Uko sikutogela hela uwunono?
40026009	Ikiba amafuta iga gekegagusiwe amagobole molofu neke vapelwe avamikaa.”
40026010	Yesu swe akulukagula neke avalongele, “Mbi ndawuli mukumufwahisa umung'inetu? Amije nene ikipigo ikinofu.
40026011	Pakuva avamikaa mwinawo mbepali neke nene mba na nyenye filo fikefu hela.
40026012	Pakuva pe akuhululisa amafuta mumuvili gwangu akungelanisa wunofu kufwa na ukutagwa kwangu.
40026013	Nachene nguvalongela, baha padalikwagwa Ulukani Ulunofu mung'i mbeyili ikipigo iki chapigite umung'inetu uyu sakilongwa ukwimila ukwiwukwa kwakwe.”
40026014	Neke baho uyumwi va vanyigendo avanyichumi na vavili ilitawa lyakwe Yuda Isikalyote ahele ku vatambisi avavina.
40026015	Ndawe avawusige ukutigila, “Mumela kiki pe ndivalonje kwe kwali?” Swe vitigila tukupela amagobole machumi gadatu;
40026016	Uluhuma baho avanzile ukusaka ikilega ukumupituka Yesu.
40026017	Ikimunyi icha kutala cha imikate je simihate uwuhahu avanyigendo va Yesu vaasile kulumwene vitigila, “Kwiyaga kwetukagelanise i Pasaka?”
40026018	Ndawe Yesu atigilige, “Mubite kuboma kulu umunu uyumwi mukamulongele umunyakaye mukatigile; ‘Umwigisi itigila, ulusika lwangu yelufisile. Kwa veve tulila i Pasaka nene na vanyigendo vangu.’ ”
40026019	Swe avanyigendo vala vipiga ndawe lwevevalongele, swe vigelanisa.
40026020	Kwavelige kwivanga ukutinala neke Yesu ateng'emale na avanyigendo vakwe vanyichumi na vavili mukulya ikilyo.
40026021	Neke baho pevalisige ndawe alongige ukutigila, “mufuuwagwe lwendilonga, mwanyenye uyumwi amituka.”
40026022	Swe vihuguvala pakomi neke vavange ukumuwusa yumwi yumwi, “Mutwa ngali nene?”
40026023	Neke Yesu atigile de, “Ye ililasa pamwi na nene mukinyandilo ye yuyo ye amituka.
40026024	Neke Umwana va Umunu akwibitilaga ndawe andikilwe, ino inalyo umunu uyo ye akumupituka Umwana va Umunu.”
40026025	Neke baho Yuda umunyakumupituka aatige, “Ngali nene Mwigisi!” Neke Yesu atigile, “Veve ulonzile.”
40026026	Vave wepevalya, Yesu inwe umukate, swe ifunyilila swe imegula, swe akuvapela avanyigendo vakwe itigila, “Mukotage mulye, ugu gwe muvili gwangu.”
40026027	Neke pe inule ikinywelo swe ilumba swe akuvapela itigila, “Munywelage mbemuli mwa iki,
40026028	Pakuva iyi ye danda yangu ya lufingano ye yikwitika wimila awolofu vadegepelwe inzanangifu.
40026029	Neke nguvalongela, sisanywa uluhuma ino umuveleko gwa umusabibu mbaka ikimunyi kila chesanywa umuveleko umupya pamwi na nyenye ku wutwa wa Dada vangu.”
40026030	Neke baho vavelige vakwimba ulwimbo sweno vihuma kwivala, swe vibita kukidunda icha imiseituni.
40026031	Neke Yesu avalongele ukutigila, “Mbemuli nyenye mung'imbila ikilo cha neng'ino, pakuva lwandike: ‘Ndimutova umukwamila ing'olo, neke ikipinga mbekili kitagalila.’
40026032	Apo penzilibwike sandongola ku Galilaya.”
40026033	Neke Petulo atigile, “Navakuleke mbevali nene singuleka nda.”
40026034	Neke Yesu atigile, “Nachene ngukulongela, ikilo iki inzogolo wesiyilavika uva umbihye kadatu.”
40026035	Ndawe Petulo atigilige, “Nakuve kufwilasa naveve singubihila nda.” Neke avanyigendo avayagwe nawo valonge ndahihyo.
40026036	Ndawe Yesu abitige nawo apono apitambulwa pa Getisemane. Ndawe avalongelige avanyigendo vakwe, ukutigila, “Muteng'emale baha nene mbite kula ngifunye.”
40026037	Ndawe abitige na Petulo na avana avavili va Sebedayo, ndawe avangige, ukuhung'una na ukuhuguvala.
40026038	Swe akuvalongela itigila, “Inumbula yangu yihuguve pakomi ngwenda fwe, sweno mwikalage miho pamwi na nene.”
40026039	Ndawe abitige kuwutalo ludodo igwa kinyalileme ivanga ukwifunya itigila, “Dada vangu, wone luke luhwane utyese uluteseko ulu, neke ulwene lulava ndawe lwendiwenda nene, pesi luvelage ndawe lwewiwenda veve.”
40026040	Ave ipiluka ku vanyigendo vakwe avadatu swe akuvafika vagonelye ndawe amulongelige Petulo itigila, “Mulemilwe ukwikala miho pamwi na nene nambi kivalilo kimwi hela?
40026041	Mwikalage miho mwifunyage mulingila mukugelwa. Inumbula yiwenda neke umuvili muhomefu.”
40026042	Swe ibita kangi ulwakavili kukwifunya we itigila, “Dada vangu, wone silwihwana nda ukutyesa uluteseko kwa nene, apo lwewiwenda veve lugendelage mumo.”
40026043	Swe ipiluka kangi, ye akuvafika avanyigendo vagonelye kangi, pakuva amiho gayo ge gatimbite na tulo.
40026044	Swe akuvaleka ibita kukwifunya ulwa wudatu, weilonga ing'ani sisilaga.
40026045	Ndawe Yesu apilukige ku vanyigendo vakwe itigila, “Pe musuupa na ukugonelela kangi? Mulavage! ikivalilo kifisile na Umwana va Umunu atawulwa mumawoko ga vanyanzanangifu.
40026046	Muwuke tubitage. Mulavage umunyakumituka ahegelye.”
40026047	Yesu we pealongana na avanyigendo vakwe ndawe Yuda aasige uyumwi va vanyigendo avanyichumi na vavili. Aasile pamwi na avanu wolofu avanyamamage na ifisonzo vevevatume na avatambisi avavina na avavaha va avanu.
40026048	Neke umwene umunyakumupituka alavalonje ikilagilo ukutigila: “Yula ye ndimunonela ye mwene yemwibatage.”
40026049	Ndawe abitige kulumwene Yesu ulusika lulo itigila, “Kamwene ve Mwigisi.” Ndawe amunonelige Yesu.
40026050	Ndawe Yesu amulongelige, “Yuda munyawiyendi pige lwewusilige.” Ndawe amalugu gaasige gamwibate Yesu neke gamupinge.
40026051	Neke baho uyumwi va avanyigendo va Yesu ndawe ategulige ilimage neke adumule ilipulikilo lya umukami va umutambisi umuvina.
40026052	Swe Yesu akumulongela itigila, “Pilule ilimage muhala, pakuva mbevali avaviwulaga kwa limage savalafwa kwa limage.

40026054	Lino wukwila ndawuli Uwandike Uwelu ukutigila wugendela mumo?”
40026055	Neke baho Yesu alilongelage ililugu lila, “Muusile na amamage na ifisonzo ndamukwibata muhiisi, ifilo mbefili ifi nge mutembeli ngigisige neke mulemwe ukundibata.
40026056	Isi mbesili sikave sambi sikwile inzandike na avavisi; ndawe avanyigendo mbevali vamulekige swe vikimbila.”
40026057	Swe avanu iwo vevamwibete Yesu ndawe vamusindikige kukaye ya umutambisi umuvina Kayafa, kuko kwe vevakong'ine avigisi va indagilo na avavaha.
40026058	Nave Petulo amuninilige kwa pataali mbaka kuluhengo kwa umutambisi umuvina, ndawe ingilige mugati na ukuteng'emala pamwi na avakami alave kwelwisilila.
40026059	Neke avatambisi avavina na gumukong'ano ugwa avavina mbevali swe vakumusakila Yesu uwolelesi wa uwudesi vamuwulage.

40026063	Neke Yesu akatuke sili. Umutambisi umuvina ndawe amulongelige, “Ngukwilapya kwa Nguluvi umumi utulongele, veve ye veve Kilisito Umwana va Nguluvi!”
40026064	Ndawe Yesu amutigilige, “Veve ulonzile! Neke nene nguvalongela, ukuhuma lino samumuwona Umwana va Umunu ateng'eme kuliwoko ilinyaludali lya kundyo akusa mumafufu gakuchanya.”
40026065	Baho umutambisi umuvina swe idemula imyenda jakwe, itigila, “Lino ye amubede Nguluvi! Twisaka wolelesi kangi wa kiki? Ndawe de mwipuliche yinyenye pibedala Nguluvi.
40026066	Mwiwona ndawuli?” Navavene swe vipitula vitigila, “Uyu inogela ukufwa!”
40026067	Ndawe vamufunyilige amati muwusu, swe vakumutova ifunzi na avangi swe vakumutova ifipi.
40026068	Avamwi vitigila, “Be, Kilisito tuganulile ye nani ye akutofile!”
40026069	Nave Petulo ealikwivala ateng'eme pidama. Ndawe amusilige umukami umuhinza neke atigile, “Na yuveve ukeulipamwi na Yesu va ku Galilaya.”
40026070	Swe ibihila wima hela pavanu itigila, “singulukagula lwewilonga.”

40026074	Pepene baho peavangige ukubihila, neke ifingulise na ukwilapa itigila, “Nene sindimuseli umunu uyu!” Ulusika lulo swe inzogolo yivika.

40027001	Kwave kwicha avatambisi avavina mbevali na vavaha va avanu valongine ifigaho ifya ukumuwulaga Yesu.
40027002	Neke vamupinge nu kumusogosa vakumutawula kwa Pilato Umutema.
40027003	Ino Yuda yeamupitwike, pe awene ulwa Yesu yeahigitwe ukufwa lwamuvafile swe ibita ukuvapilulila avatambisi avavina na avavaha amagobole machumi gadatu.
40027004	Neke atigile, “Nzananzile ukuyipituka Idanda yesinzananga kinu” neke vatigile, “Mbi lukutuvava kiki hwehwe? Ulo ulukagula yuveve.”

40027010	neke pevagulile amagobole gala ililungulu ilya amatago, ndawe Umutwa lwealandaje.”
40027011	Swe Yesu vakumwimya kulumutema, neke umutema amuwuse umwene, “Veve ye veve vemutwa va Avayudaya!” Yesu amupitwe, “Veve ulonzile.”
40027012	Neke peemutose na avatambisi avavina na avavaha, siapituligi lukani.
40027013	Neke Pilato amutigile, “Siwipulika isi mbesili se vakukolelela veve?”
40027014	Siamupitwi nambi lukani, neke Umutema asasave pakomi.
40027015	Ino ikimunyi ikikomi icha i Pasaka umutema eina musimu gwakwe gwa kuvadindulila umunu uyumwi va avanyandinde yula yevamuwendige.
40027016	Ino pepina munyandinde yeakagulanikige hilo atambuligwe Balaba.
40027017	Neke Pilato atigile, “Mwisaka ndivadindulile yalikwi? Balaba apangi Yesu yeitambulwa Kilisito?”
40027018	Pakuva ealukagwe ulwa vamuletite kwa gila.
40027019	Na peeateng'eme pakigoda icha ukuhigila uvakwe amutumye lukani ukutigila, “Ulapiga kinu kulumunu uyu umugolofu, pakuva neng'ino nesike pakomi mumaloto ukwimila Umunu uyo.”
40027020	Ino avatambisi avavina na avavaha vavakuvilise avanu vamusuke Balaba sambi Yesu awulagwe.
40027021	Umutema kangi swe akuvatigila, “Ye nani kuvavili iva yemwisaka nene ndimudindulile?” Neke pe vatigile, “Balaba.”
40027022	Neke Pilato peavatigile, “Ino ngitage ndawuli kwa Yesu yeitambulwa Kilisito.” Neke mbevali vatigile, “Atumbikwage.”
40027023	Neke peatigile, “Mbi kiki ikibi cheapigite?” Neke pevayovele ng'ani mbevali, “Atumbikwage.”
40027024	Ino Pilato aveiwona siinosa kinu, ligina liliyowo, swe akwegula ululenga swe ikalava amawoko gakwe pamalugu itigila, “Nene sindimwananga kinu ku danda ya umunu uyu umugolofu mulukagula yinyenye.”
40027025	Neke avanu mbevali vatigile, “Idanda yakwe lekage yive kwa hwehwe na kuvanetu!”
40027026	Neke peamudindulile Balaba na peyeamutofile Yesu ni mikova amutawe sambi vamutumbike mu musalaba.
40027027	Neke avanyigalu va Pilato vamusindike Yesu mubwalo iya uwutema, neke ikilugu mbekili kimukong'anikile.
40027028	Neke ipo vamuwopwe imyenda jakwe nu kumufwika isopeka idung'u,
40027029	neke vative ikihalama ikinyamifwa nu kumufwika mumutwe neke vamupele uludete mwiwoko ilya kundyo. Neke vamufugamile vakumwelanga vitigila, “Kamwene ve Mutwa va Avayudaya!”
40027030	Neke pevamufunyile amati swe vitegula uludete lula neke vamukong'olelage kumutwe.
40027031	Na peyevamwelanzile na ukumuwopola isopeka yila swe vakumufwika imyenda jakwe nu kumusindika kukumutumbika.
40027032	Napevahumige vatang'ine na Umunu uva ku Kilene, ilitawa lyakwe ye Simoni neke vamung'ang'anise ategule umusalaba gwa Yesu.
40027033	Neke na pevafisile apono apitambulwa Goligota kwekutigila, “(apono pa ikibang'a).”
40027034	Vamupelye idifayi yeyenyanze na ikinyongo sambi anywe, neke peagesise abihye ukunywa.
40027035	Vave vakumutumbika Yesu vagavine imyenda jakwe kwa ukutova isimbi; (sambi lukwile ulukani ululonge na umuvisi, vagavine imyenda jangu na isopeka yangu vakugitovela isimbi.)
40027036	Neke pevateng'emale nu kumuminga.
40027037	Neke pachanya pa musalaba gwakwe vatovelye uwandike, “UYU YE YESU UMUTWA VA AVAYUDAYA.”
40027038	Ino pepina avahiisi vavili avevatumbikwe pamwi na Yesu uyumwi kwiwoko ilya kundyo uyungi kwiwoko ilya kung'igi.
40027039	Neke vala vevalutilige mung'asi vayunzige imitwe jawo vakumuliga vitigila,
40027040	“Be, vemunyakudenya Itembeli nu kusenga mu filo fidatu, wipoke uwumi wako, na wone wi mwana va Nguluvi, wiike uluhuma mu musalaba.”
40027041	Neke avatambisi avavina, pamwi na avigisi va indagilo na avavaha, vamwelanzile vitigila, “Aponise avangi ilemwa ukwiponia yumwene.
40027042	Ye mutwa va Avaisilaeli, leke iike uluhuma mu musalaba neke petumufuuwe.
40027043	Alaamwihuvye Nguluvi, kono weakwitigila umwene Mwana va Nguluvi; ino leke tandi, Nguluvi amuponiage, wone inogelwa nave.”
40027044	Neke na avahiisi avevatumbike pamwi na Yesu nawo vamulisile ndahihyo.
40027045	Ino uluhuma paikivalilo icha mutanda pamunyi ing'i mbeyili lwavelwisa mbaka paikivalilo icha igonza pelitegamwike.
40027046	Neke paikivalilo icha igonza pelitegamwike Yesu akoolite kwa liswi likomi itigila, “Eli, Eli lamasabakitani.” Kwekutigila, “Nguluvi vangu, Nguluvi vangu, mbi ndawuli undesile?”
40027047	Neke avali mulubali vimile pevapulike vatigee, “Umunu uyu ikemela Eliya.”
40027048	Neke uyumwi akimbile akategule ilisambi ilisabike mudifayi inzasamufu neke avike muludete neke peamupelanise Yesu anywe.
40027049	Neke avangi vatigile, “Musindile, leke tulave apangi Eliya aasa amuponia.”
40027050	Yesu kangi peakoolite kwa liswi likomi ndawe umutima gwadumukige.
40027051	Ino ulusika lulo, ikibupa cha ilyenda ilya mutembeli ilya demwike neke lihume pavili uluhuma kuchanya mbaka pasi. Ing'i swe yiva na kitulo, amaganga gamegwike;
40027052	Nafifyanga fyadindwike, na gimivili ija avagolofu avevafwe jasilibwike.
40027053	Na pevahumile mufyanga Yesu peyeasilibwike vahele kuboma inzelu neke vitang'ane na awolofu.
40027054	Ino umuvina va avanyigalu na vala avevalipamwi vevamumingige Yesu, pevawene ikitulo na ing'ani sinyawuhulo vakuvye wuhulo vitigila, “Uyu nachene ake Mwana va Nguluvi.”
40027055	Pala pepina avang'inetu wolofu, avalavisige kwa pataali, iwo ve vala avamufwatige Yesu uluhuma ku Galilaya na avamupigilige.
40027056	Uyumwi va iwo e Maliya Magadalena, na Maliya uyuve va Yakobo na Yosefu, pamwinga na uyuva va avana va Sebedayo.
40027057	Pakive kimihye aasile umunu umunono ukuhuma ku Alimataya, ikemelwa Yosefu nave ali munyigendo va Yesu.
40027058	Ahele kwa Pilato akasuke umufimba gwa Yesu. Pilato alaje Yosefu apelwe umufimba gula.
40027059	Swe Yosefu itegula umufimba neke agufwike isanda ya umwenda umunofu.
40027060	Neke peatage muwuvi wakwe weeayafile mwitalawe, swe ibidukisa iliganga ilikomi pamulyango gwa uwuvi neke abitage.
40027061	Maliya Magadalena na Maliya uyungi ve baho vateng'eme palubali pachanga.
40027062	Ikimunyi icha kavili tutigile ikimunyi icha ukutala kukimunyi icha ukugelanisa, avatambisi avavina pamwinga na Avafalisayo vahele kwa Pilato,
40027063	vitigila, “Muvaha tukwiwuka umudesi yula peemumi atigilige ngali: ‘Pefilutye ifilo fidatu asilibuka.’
40027064	Ino lagilage, sambi chakwe kimingwe mbaka pa ikimunyi icha wudatu, sambi apono pangi, avanyigendo vakwe valemwe ukubita vamuhiise vasindike sambi vavalongele avanu ulwa asilibwike kuvafwe. Uwudesi uwu wulonga wulutile kwa wula uwamutalo.”
40027065	Pilato avatige, “Mwinawo avanyigalu mubite mukaminge ichanga wunofu.
40027066	Swe ndawe vabitige kukuminga ichanga kila wunofu, swe vivika na ing'olekelo mwiganga lila pamwi na avanyigalu.”
40028001	Lino peyilutye isabato, pe sambi kwidandaluka pa Jumapili, Maliya Magadalena nayi Maliya uyungi vahele kukulava ichanga.
40028002	Swe lulusika lulo pave na kitulo kikomi mung'i; ndawe aasige umunyivaha va Umutwa ukuhuma kuchanya nu kubidusa iliganga, neke ateng'emalile.
40028003	Na uwusu wakwe wewindawe ulumuli na imyenda jakwe je myelu wita wusee.
40028004	Avanya kumuminga wogwipe hilo vikuvila viva nda vafwe.
40028005	Neke umunyivaha avalongele avang'inetu, “Mulogopa! pakuva ngulukagula ukutigila mukumusaka Yesu yevamutumbike.
40028006	Siipwali ipa nda, pakuva asilibwike ndawe alongige. Muse mulave apono peemulambalike.
40028007	Ino mwangupe mubite mukavalongele avanyigendo vakwe ulwa asilibwike uluhuma kuvafwe wonage akuvalongolela ukubita ku Galilaya; kwekwene kwemumuwona. Yendivalonje.”
40028008	Swe vakwangufya pakuhega wevinawogofi uwunyaluhekelelo lukomi.
40028009	Ndawe Yesu vitang'anige nawo neke atigile, “Kamwene.” Swe vihegelela nu kumwibata amagulu neke vamufugamile.
40028010	Ndawe Yesu avatigilige, “Mulogopa! Mubitage mukavalongele avanyalukolo vangu vabite ku Galilaya kwevambona nene.”
40028011	Na pevabitige, lavage, avanyakuminga avamwi vahele muboma neke vakavalongele avatambisi avavina mbesili sevasiwene.
40028012	Avatambisi avavina ndawe vakong'anige na avavaha, neke vagahe ikigaho ndawe vavafupige avanyigalu magobole molofu.
40028013	Neke vavatigilage, ‘Muvalongelage avanu ukuta avanyigendo vakwe vaasile pakilo neke vamuhiise petugonelye.’
40028014	Ulukani ulu wone lupulise kulumutema hwehwe tulongana nave mulahuguvala.”
40028015	Ndawe avanyigalu vategulige amagobole nu kupiga lwevevalagile. Neke ululongwa ulu lwatagalye ku Vayudaya mbaka neng'ino.
40028016	Ino avanyigendo vanyichumi na yumwi vahele ku Galilaya, kukidunda chealavalagilye Yesu.
40028017	Na vave vakumuwona ndawe napevamuwene ndawe vamusunyalilige, neke avangi vasinite.
40028018	Neke Yesu aase neke avatigile, “Uludali mbeluli ulwa kuchanya na mung'i ngapelitwe nene.
40028019	Ino mubitage mukavapitule avanu mbevali ava konivala vave vanyigendo vangu, mukavabatise mwitawa lya Dada, Umwana na Umuhe umwelu.
40028020	Na ukuvigisa vinatilage mbesili sendavalaje nene. Neke nene mba na nyenye mbepali mbaka kuwusililo uwa ing'i.”
41001001	Umuvango gwa Ulukani Ulunofu lwa Yesu Kilisito Umwana va Nguluvi.
41001002	Ndawe lwandikwe nu muvisi Yesaya: “Lavage ngumutuma umuvanda vangu akulongolele; yemwene yawuyapa ing'asi yako.
41001003	Iliswi ilya Umunu ilipulisa mubalali: ‘Mumuwuyapilage ing'asi Umutwa, mugololage ifikolo fyakwe.’ ”
41001004	Yohane umubatisi awonike mubalali idalika ulwa luvavaje avanu ukupela inzanangifu nu kubatisiwa sambi Nguluvi avadegepele inzanangifu sawo.
41001005	Neke pevamubitile avanu mbevali ava ku Yudaya na ava ku Yelusalemu, neke pevabatisiwe na umwene ku mukoga gwa Yolodani vipela inzanangifu sawo.
41001006	Ino Yohane afwalige umwenda ugwe mutive nu lubahila lwa ingamiya na umusipi gwa ing'ingo mukigudi chakwe. Alisige imanzi na uwuuki mwihala.
41001007	Nave adalikige itigila, “Pa nene akusa umunyaludali ukundutila nene; kwa uyu nene sinywaniti ngondame mamise nambi kuhudula imikova ja indatu sakwe.
41001008	Nene nguvabatisa kwa lulenga, neke umwene saavabatisa kwa Umuhe Umwelu.”
41001009	Ifilo fila Yesu aasile uluhuma ku Nasaleti iya ku Galilaya neke abatisiwe na Yohane ku mukoga gwa ku Yolodani.
41001010	Neke na peahumile mululenga uluvala lulo awene kuchanya kudindwike neke Umuhe iikage kulumwene wita ingunda.

41004001	Kangi Yesu avanzile ukwigisa, peali palubali pa inyanza. Neke amalugu makomi gegakong'ine gamupilime, swe akwingila mukipugu neke ateng'emale mugati kono ikipugu we kilimululenga ililugu mbelili lyelili mumwani.
41004002	Neke peavigise ifinu fyolofu ikola figaniso, neke peakwigisa avatigilage,
41004003	“Mupulikage! Umuvyasi ahele kukuvyala.
41004004	Neke peivyala inyadikwa isingi sagwilye mung'asi, neke ifidege fyuse neke filye.
41004005	Isingi sagwe mwitalawe umwemwina luganga lukefu ulusika silusika samesile, pakuva pepagaya luganga lolofu;
41004006	Neke ilisuva pelivasile sakasile pakuva sengaya ndela.
41004007	Isingi sagwe mumifwa neke imifwa givine swe gitova neke silemwe ukuveleka.
41004008	Neke isingi sagwe muluganga ulunono naso samesile savinite na ukuveleka: iyimwi yiveleka imeke machumi gadatu, na iyimwi machumi gimutanda na iyingi ligana.”
41004009	Neke atigile, “Umunyamapulikilo gakupulikila, apulikage.”

41004012	Sambi, ‘Valave hilo, neke valemwe pakuluwona, vapulike hilo, neke valemwe pakulukagula. Wone sindahihyo, vake vamupitukila Nguluvi, Nave ake avadegepela.’ ”
41004013	Neke Yesu avawuse, “Simukukikagula ikiganiso iki? Mbi ino mufikagula ndawuli ifiganiso mbefili?
41004014	Umunyakuvyala aivyala ulukani lwa Nguluvi.
41004015	Neke iva vevala avali mung'asi, mula mwe ulukani luvyale; na pevapulike ulusika lulo Setani akusa neke ategule ulukani uluvyale muvene.
41004016	Neke iva vindawe vala avavyale mwitalawe pevapulike ulukani ulusika lulo vakwanukila kwa luhekelelo.

41004018	Neke avangi vevala avavyale mumifwa; vevala avavipulika ulukani.

41004020	Neke vala avevavyale muluganga ulunono vevala avavipulika ulukani na ukwanukila, neke vaveleke amaveleko; machumi gadatu avangi machumi gimutanda, na avangi ligana.”
41004021	Yesu ave peavalongela, “Mbi pwali umunu yeaikunga ulung'ali neke afihe mukisilo nave mwifungu lya uwuhaga? Nda sipwali, ulung'ali lwalwivikwa pachanya paluwumba.
41004022	Pakuva sikokili ikifihe, chesisakivikwa pawelu, kangi sikokili ikigubikile chesisakigubulwa.
41004023	Umunu umunya mapulikilo gakupulikila apulikage.”
41004024	Neke avatigile, “Mwinatilage semwipulika! Ikigelo kila chemwigelanikisa avanu vangi sakiva che kigelo chesamugelanisiwa nyenye na ukuwilwa.
41004025	Pakuva yula yeinafyo saapelwa, na uluhuma kwa yula yeihela na kikilaga cheinacho saapokwa.”
41004026	Yesu we peavalongela, “Uwutwa wa Nguluvi windawe umunu yeaivyala inyadikwa mumugunda.
41004027	Neke ibitilage, wesiakulukagula chekipigika kunyadikwa pakilo na pamunyi.
41004028	Pakuva ing'i yayimesa yiyene tasi ikimelo, pambele ilihoo ilinyameke isa ingano.
41004029	Neke ingano peyitung'wine umunyakuvyala aibita na ikibenelo swe ivanga ukubena pakuva isanga yeyifikite.”
41004030	Neke Yesu atigile, “ Tuwiganisa na kiki uwutwa wa Nguluvi?
41004031	Windawe inyadikwa iya umuhaladali indodo hilo ukulutila inyadikwa mbesili sa mung'i.
41004032	Neke peyivyalitwe na ukumela yayigunga neke yive mubiki mukomi, ukulutila ifimelo mbefili ifya mumugunda na ukuva na matagala makomi, na ifidege ifya mwihala fihwanite fisenge uwusulya mumatagala.”
41004033	Ukukola ifiganiso ifyolofu ifindawe ifi avalongelige avanu ulukani lwakwe, ndawe mwevevahwanite ukulukagula.
41004034	Sialongigi nawo pesi ukukola ikiganiso, neke kukinyele avaganulilige avanyigendo vakwe ing'ani mbesili.
41004035	Ikimunyi kikila, peyive kinyamihye avatige, “Leke tulowoke kumwambu.”
41004036	Neke avaleke vamalugu, swe ibitaga na avanyigendo vakwe mukipugu cheemwali. Pala pepofili ifipugu ifingi fyefyahegise.
41004037	Neke ikifulufumbi chuse neke amavingo gitova ikipugu na ikipugu yechekivanzile ukumema ululenga.
41004038	Umwene Yesu alagonelye weihagwee umwihago mukipugu kicho, swe vakumulamusa neke vamutigile, “Mwigisi siwihosa ulwa hwehwe twifwa?”
41004039	Neke pealamuke akenyele ikifulufumbi swe itigila kumavingo, “Sike! Sikimale!” Swe ikifulufumbi kisika swe kwiva na wutendemafu wukomi.
41004040	Neke avatigile, “Mbi ndawuli mukogopa? muvagaya lufuuwo?”
41004041	Neke vave na muhwehwe mukomi vakwiwusa, “Uyu ye nani ye na ikifulufumbi kikumupulika?”
41005001	Neke pevafisile kumwambu, kung'i iya Vagelasi.
41005002	Peikite uluhuma mukipugu, kula kufyanga itang'ine na umunu umunyamasoka.
41005003	Uyo ikalige mufyanga alasukuli umunu yealahwana ukumupinga nambi kwa munyololo.
41005004	Pakuva kolofu vamupingige na inzisi na iminyololo, na mbepali adumulige inzisi na giminyololo na alasukuli umunu yealahwanite ukumwibata.
41005005	Pakilo na pamunyi ikalige kufyanga na mufidunda we ikoolaga na ukwitemanga na amaganga.
41005006	Neke peamuwene Yesu kwa pataali, amukimbilye, swe akamufugamile.
41005007	Iyovela pachanya itigila, “Wisaka upige kiki kwa nene, Yesu ve Mwana va Nguluvi yealikuchanya? Ngukulongela mwitawa lya Nguluvi ngukugongola ulanesa!”
41005008	(Alonzile ndahihyo pakuva Yesu amutige, “Hege kulu Munu uyo ve lisoka.”)
41005009	Ndawe Yesu amuwusige, “Ilitawa lyako winani?” amupitwe, “Ilitawa lyangu ndi kilugu pakuva twiwolofu.”
41005010	Neke umunu uyo amugongolite hilo Yesu alagahaka gala amasoka mung'i yila.
41005011	Ino, kwekwina ikipinga cha ingubi chakwamililige mwivambala lya ikidunda.
41005012	Swe amasoka gala gamugongolite gitigila, “Tusindike mungubi sambi hwehwe twingile musene.”
41005013	Neke atigile mubite. Ndawe amasoka gahumite kulumunu yula, swe gakwingila mungubi. Na ikipinga mbekili cha ingubi mbilima sivili chasulunuche pa kisulunukila mbaka mu nyanza kisuda mululenga kifwa.
41005014	Avanyakukwamila swe vikimbila, vakuvalongela avanyaboma na ing'i mbeyili. Swe avanu vakusa valave lula ulupigike.
41005015	Ndawe vamubitilige Yesu, vakamulave umunyamasoka vakumuwona ateng'eme pala afwite imyenda ina luhala ulukwilaniche hela, umunu yeeina masoka molofu pamwandi neke wogope hilo.
41005016	Na vala avaluwene ulwelupigike, ku munyamasoka na kungubi vavalonje avayawo ing'ani mbesili sesapigike ku munyamasoka na kungubi.
41005017	Neke pevavange ukumugongola Yesu ahege mulutanana lwa ing'i yawo.
41005018	Neke peyeakwingila mukipugu umunu yula yeeina amasoka amusukite ulwa vave pamwi.
41005019	Neke Yesu abihile amutigile, “Bite kukaye ku vanyalukolo vako, ukavalongele chakupije umutwa vako, na weagisile ukukuwonela ulusungu.”
41005020	Ndawe avangige ukudalika kulutanana ulunyaboma isinyichumi isikemelwa Dekapoli ing'ani ingomi mbesili seamupije Yesu; avanu mbevali vasasave pakomi.
41005021	Nave Yesu pealowike kumwambu inzayo na ikipugu. Na amalugu makomi gakong'ine na ukumupilima, nave ealimulubali mwa inyanza.
41005022	Neke pease umuvina uyumwi va isinagogi ilitawa lyakwe Yailo; nave peamuwone swe e igwa pamagulu ga Yesu.
41005023	Igongola hilo itigila, “Umwalivangu mutamwa sambi ifwa, wuse umugeleke amawoko gako, sambi apone ave mumi.”
41005024	Swe Yesu vibitasa na Yailo kono amalugu gegegamupilime gamuninilige.
41005025	Na umo emwali umung'inetu yeahumige idanda myaka minyichumi na givili.
41005026	Na umung'inetu uyo agudite muvakofi va imigoda wolofu na ukutawula mbefili fye alinafyo wesiilamukilagi neke peagine ukusakala hilo.
41005027	Na peapulike isa Yesu, aninilige mumbele mwa Yesu swe iluting'asa mumalugu ipamisa umwenda.
41005028	Pakuva atige, “Wone mamise hela umwenda gwakwe mona.”
41005029	Na lulusika lululaga idanda yadumwike pakuhuma swe akwipulika mumuvili gwakwe ulwa yaponite uwutamwa wakwe.
41005030	Neke Yesu, lulusika lulula iwene ulwa uludali lwakwe lukepite, swe akuvapitukila avamalugu itigila, “Ye nani yeapamise imyenda jangu?”
41005031	Neke avanyigendo vakwe vamutigile, “Mbi sukugawona amalugu agakubanite, nave witigila ye nani yeakupamise?”
41005032	Neke umwene pealave kono na kono ulwa wanda amuwona umunu yeagisile ndahihyo.
41005033	Neke umung'inetu yula weakulukagula ulupigike kulumwene kono we akogopa swe igwa pamagulu ga Yesu neke peilogole mbesili.
41005034	Neke Yesu peamutigile, “Mwalivangu ulufuuwo lwako lukuponise. Wibitile na uwikalakunoga, ponage uwutamwa wako.”
41005035	Ave Yesu wepealonga, vaasile avanu uluhuma kukaye iya Umuvina va isinagogi vakumukutila ulwa, “Umwaliwo afwe. Lweki uve peumufwahisa Umwigisi?”
41005036	Neke Yesu abedale sevalongige swe akumutigila Umuvina va isinagogi, “Ulogopa, velage na lufuuwo hela.”
41005037	Neke avakanile avangi valamuninila, pesi Petulo na Yakobo na Yohane umwanakwave va Yakobo.
41005038	Na peyevafisile kukaye iya umuvina va isinagogi swe akuvawona avanu vasasing'ine vivemba na ukuyova.
41005039	Neke peinje avatige, “Mbi ndawuli musasing'ine na ukuvemba? Umwana siafwi nda agonelye hela.”
41005040	Neke vamuheke swe akuvahumya mbevali kwivala, swe ibita na udade va Umwana na yu Yuve neke na vala avanyigendo vakwe vakwingila kwe ekwali umwana.
41005041	Ndawe amwibatige iliwoko na ukumulongela, “Talita nyichumi,” kwe kutigila, “Ve muhinza, ngukulongela lamuke.”
41005042	Swe ulusika lululaga umuhinza alamwike ivanga ukugenda. (Pakuva alagelaniche myaka ginyichumi na givili.) Na lulusika lululaga avanu vasasavale.
41005043	Nave avakanie hilo vala, ulwa alalukagula munu ulu, neke peavalongele vamupele ikinu alye.
41006001	Yesu ahesile uluhuma pala neke peabite kung'i yakwe, na vanyigendo vakwe vamuninile.
41006002	Na paikimunyi icha isabato avange ukwigisa musinagogi, na awolofu avapulike vasasavale vitigila, “Umunu uyu akasiwene kwi mbesili isi? Wunyandolo wuki we apelitwe? miitu miki igi igipigika na amawoko gakwe?
41006003	Uyu si yeyuyula umuhongosi, Umwana va Maliya, na Umame va Yakobo, nayi Yosefu, Yuda nayi Simoni? Kangi na vavahase sitwinawo ipa?” Swe vakumubihila.
41006004	Ndawe Yesu avatigilige, “Umuvisi aiva mutambule mbekuli pesi kung'i yakwe na ku vanyalukolo vakwe na mukaye yakwe hela.”
41006005	Neke alemwe ukupiga imiitu baho, pesi avagelike amawoko avatamwa vakefu hela, nu kuvaponia.
41006006	Yesu asasavale ukwimila uwugaya lufuuwo lwawo. Ndawe Yesu abitige mufijiji akwigisa avanu.
41006007	Nave avakemelye avigendo avanyichumi na vavili ndawe avangige ukuvatuma vavili vavili. Neke avapele ululagi lwa ukuhumisa amasoka,
41006008	sweno akuvalagila, “Valategula kinu pesi lulubamba swe, nambi ichakulya nambi bogolo, nambi magobole mumapembo gawo.
41006009	Vafwalage indatu valafwala isopeka sivili.”
41006010	Neke peavatigile, “Pe mwinje mukaye, mwikalage baho mbaka pe mwihega.
41006011	Neke wone pave popali apono pesivavanuchi, vabihile ukuvapulika mupunage ulungundi mumagulu genyu sambi wuve wolelesi kuvene.”
41006012	Ndawe vabitige kukudalika ulwa avanu vahongesage na ukupela.
41006013	Nawo vihumya amasoka; na ukubaka amafuta avatamwa wolofu, nawo vaponite.
41006014	Umutema Helode apulike iso mbesili, pakuva ilitawa lya Yesu lyelikagulanike mbekuli. Avanu avamwi vatigile, “Ye Yohane umubatisi asilibwike ukuhuma kuvafwe, nambi inakitulo cha imiitu igipigikila mulumwene.”
41006015	Neke avangi vatigile, “Ye Eliya.” Neke avangi vatigile, “Uyu ye muvisi, ndawe avavisi avayagwe avapidaha.”
41006016	Neke Helode peapulike ulu atigee, “Yohane! Ye ndamudumwe asilibwike.”
41006017	Pakuva Helode atumite avanu neke vamwibate Yohane, swe akumusopa mundinde akumuvala Helodiya ye ali mukina Filipo umunyalukolo vawo, pakuva alamutegwe.
41006018	Pakuva Yohane atigee kwa Helode, “Silulagile kwa veve ukumutegula umukina munyalukolo vako.”
41006019	Neke Helodiya amuvipile wuhulo Yohane, awendige amuwulage.
41006020	Neke sahwaniti, pakuva Helode amwogopige Yohane, alukagulige ukuta Yohane e munu mugolofu kangi mwelu, nambi amulekige ave muwunofu. Helode awendige ukumupulikisa Yohane, na lwave peyeamupulikise asasing'anige wuhulo.
41006021	Neke ikimunyi ikikomi cha ukwiwuka ukuwoneka kwa Helode awuyepe ikiwungo na ifyakulya sambi ave na uluhekelelo pamwi na avavaha va pawuhigilo na avavina va avanyigalu na avalongola va mu Galilaya.
41006022	Ndawe aasige umwalive va Helodiya neke awunge, sweno Helode na avagenzi vakwe lwanoje hilo neke umutwa amutigile umuhinza yula, “Sukage nene che wisaka, nene ngupela.”
41006023	Neke amwilapile, “Che usuka kwa nene, nene ngupela; nave ulubali ulumwi lwa uwutema wangu.”
41006024	Neke umuhinza ahumile akumuwusa uyuve, “Sukage kiki?” Neke uyuve atigile, “Umutwe gwa Yohane umubatisi.”
41006025	Ndawe umuhinza ingilige lulusika lulula ku mutwa itigila, “Ndisaka umele yilinode umutwe gwa Yohane umubatisi muluhelo.”
41006026	Umutwa swe ihuguvala hilo, ino pakuva yeeilapite ulwilapo lwakwe pa avagenzi siawenditi alemwe ukukwisa ulukani lwakwe ku muhinza uyo.
41006027	Swe lulusika lulo umutwa ituma umunyigalu akalete umutwe gwa Yohane. Ndawe umunyigalu abitige mundinde mweemwali Yohane swe akumudumula,
41006028	neke pealete umutwe muluhelo amupele umuhinza, swe umuhinza akumusindikila uyuve.
41006029	Neke avanyigendo vakwe Yohane pevapulike vahele neke vategule umuvili gwakwe vasakutaga ku matago.
41006030	Avigendo vapilwike kwa Yesu neke vamulongele mbesili sevapigite na ukwigisa.
41006031	Neke atigile kuvene, “Muse yinyenye kulubali musuupe ludodo pakuva avanu wolofu aavasige nu ukubita neke vagaye uwulegefu uwa ukusuupa na ukulya.”
41006032	Ndawe vabitige na ikipugu apono pa ikilega.
41006033	Ino avanu wolofu vavawene pevibita neke vavakagule. Sweno awolofu vahumite iboma mbesili, vikimbilila kweekwali Yesu na avanyigendo vakwe, avene vilongola ukufika.
41006034	Nape vikige pamwani Yesu awene amalugu makomi ga vanu neke avawonele ulusungu, pakuva vevindawe ing'olo ingaya umunyakukwamila. Neke peavange ukuvigisa ing'ani nzolofu.
41006035	Ikimunyi pekilutye avigendo vakwe vaasile kwa Yesu vamutigile, “Ipa pe ihala hela na lisuva yelisalye.
41006036	Ikiba uvilage avanu iva, vabite mumigunda na mufijiji ifilimwipi neke vigulile ifya ukulya.”
41006037	Neke avapitule, “Nyenye muvapele ichakulya.” Nawo vamuwusise, “Ngali hwehwe tubitage tukagule imikate ija dinali magana gavili sambi tuvapele valye?”
41006038	Neke Yesu avawuse, “Mwina mikate gilinga? Mubite mulave.” Neke pevalafile vatigee, “Gihanu na somba sivili.”
41006039	Neke pealagile mbevali vateng'emale fiwungu fiwungu
41006040	Swe viteng'emala pasi fiwungu fiwungu fya avanu ligana ligana na machumi gahanu gahanu.
41006041	Neke egule imikate igihanu na isomba isivili swe ilava kuchanya akumulumba Nguluvi, neke pe amegule umukate, swe avapele avanyigendo vakwe sambi vavagavile avanu. Na sisomba isivili naso avagavie mbevali.
41006042	Swe mbevali valye, neke vigute.
41006043	Ndawe vasavige uwuwuluwulu wa imikate na isomba fitangula finyichumi na fivili fimemile.
41006044	Na avalye imikate gila ve vanyidama mbilima sihanu.
41006045	Ulusika lulula avatige avanyigendo vakwe vingile mukipugu valongole kumwambu ku Betisaida, umwene epeavilaga vamalugu.
41006046	Na peavilasile ahele kukidunda kukwifunya.
41006047	Na ikinyamihye pekifisile ikipugu che pagati ya inyanza, nave eiyena hela mung'i ing'afu.
41006048	Sweno, avawene avanyigendo vakwe viguda pakugenza ikipugu na imitela pakuva ikifulufumbi chevategulisige. Na pembe kwicha, Yesu ahele kuvene, igenda muchanya mu nyanza. Ave ndaakuvalutila,
41006049	neke pevamuwene igenda munyanza vatigilige vakiwene kisuka swe vikoola;
41006050	pakuva mbevali pevamuwene vave na muhwehwe mukomi. Nave Yesu ndawe avatigilige, “Musikimalage, ye nene. Mulava na muhwehwe!”
41006051	Swe akwingila mukipugu, mwevemumo, na ikifulufumbi kisikimala. Nawo vakabwike hilo,
41006052	pakuva sivevalalukagula ulwa imikate, neke inumbula sawo save pesito.
41006053	Neke na peyevalowike inyanza, vafikite mung'i ya mu Genesaleti.
41006054	Neke na peyevikite mukipugu, ulusika lulula avanu swe vakumukagula Yesu.
41006055	Sweno, ndawe vabitige vakwangupa mung'i yila mbeyili, kukuleta avanu avatamwa mufivasikiso fyawo, vavasindikige mbekuli kweekwali Yesu.
41006056	Na kukweabitige Yesu mufijiji, muboma, na mu malungulu vavalambalikige avatamwa paluvanza, na ukumugongola Yesu ulwa nambi vake vapamise avatamwa ulupindo lwa umwenda gwakwe hela. Na mbevali avapamisige vaponige.
41007001	Neke Avafalisayo pamwinga na Avigisi va indagilo, avevahumile ku Yelusalemu swe vikong'ana kwa Yesu.
41007002	Vave vakuvawona avanyigendo vakwe avamwi vilya ichakulya na amawoko amahongawinya kwekutigila sivevakalivi.
41007003	Pakuva Avafalisayo na Avayudaya mbevali sivilisagi kinu wesivakalivi amawoko gawo wunofu ukwinatila indongwa isa avanyakataali vawo.
41007004	Kangi, sivilisagi kinu chekivesaga ikitumite pamagulilo, mbaka peyevafyofwige. Kangi kosili inzigiso isingi sevevanuche ukuhuma kwa avanyakataali vawo ndawe ukofuga ifinywelo, ifitonga na ifinu fingi ifiwuyape na ifyuma.
41007005	Neke Avafalisayo na avigisi va indagilo vamuwuse Yesu, “Mbi ndawuli avanyigendo vako sivavakwinatila indongwa isa avanyakataali, pevilya na amawoko amahongawinya?”
41007006	Neke peavatigile, “Yesaya avilite wunofu isa nyenye nyevabuganisi ndawe lweandike: ‘Avanu iva vakunzogopa kwakulonga hela, Inumbula sawo silipataali na nene,
41007007	Vakwifwahisa hela ukusunyalila pakuva, vakwigisa fila fye vakwivangila vavene indagilo sawo hela.’
41007008	Mukusileka indagilo sa Nguluvi neke mwinatile indongwa isa avanu.”
41007009	Neke peavatigile, “Mwivasugu pa kugubika indagilo isa Nguluvi sambi mwinatile indongwa senyu!
41007010	Pakuva Musa atige, ‘Mwogopage udado na uyuwo,’ na, ‘Yula ye aliga udade nave uyuve, lumuvaje ukufwa.’
41007011	Ino nyenye mwakwigisa, ‘Wone umunu ave na ikinu cheisaka avatange nacho udade na yuyuve, neke hambi atigile ikinu icho kolabani (kwekutigila kitawulwa kwa Nguluvi),
41007012	Swe lino silumuvaji ukumutanga udade nambi uyuve.’
41007013	Uko kwekubedala ulukani ulwa Nguluvi na ukwinatila indongwa senyu semwakwilekela. Kangi mwipigaga nzolofu isihwana na siso.”
41007014	Neke Yesu avakemele vamalugu vaase swe akuvatigila, “Mbemuli mupulikisage sambi mulukagule.
41007015	Kisukuli ikinu ikikwingilaga mulumunu uluhuma kwivala chekilekaga umunu ave mwanangifu, ali ikinu ikihuma mugati mulumunu icho chechakileka ave mwanangifu. [
41007016	Wone kwina umunu umunyamapulikilo aga ukupulikila lekage apulike!”]
41007017	Neke na peinje mukaye weagulesile umukong'ano gwa vanu avanyigendo vakwe neke vamuwuse ulwa ikiganiso.
41007018	Neke peavatigile, “Kumbi nayi nyenye mwivagaya luhala? Simukuluwona ulwa ikinu ikikwingila mulumunu uluhuma kwivala sichakileka umunu anangike,
41007019	pakuva sichakwingila munumbula, icho chakwingila mwileme neke kiluting'asa na ukutagwa kwihala?” (Pakulonga ulu esise ifilyo mbefili.)
41007020	Neke peatigile, “Ichakihuma mulumunu che chakileka umunu ave mwanangifu.
41007021	Pakuva mugati munumbula sa avanu, gagihuma amahosa amabi, uwugoni, uwuhiisi, uwuwulasi,
41007022	Uwusafi, uwung'ung'unu, uwaafu, uwugaya choga, uwifu, igila, uwulisi, ikidada na uwupufi.
41007023	Imbi mbesili isi sasihuma mugati mulumunu sesene sesasileka umunu ave mwanangifu.”
41007024	Neke uluhuma pala awukite swe ibita kung'i iya ku Tilo na ku Sidoni. Ndawe ingilige mukaye iyingi, neke sawenditi umunu alu kagule; nambi ndahihyo ave siafihimi.
41007025	Neke ulusika lulula, umung'inetu, yeeina umwalive ina masoka, apulike isa Yesu. Neke, pease afugame pamagulu gakwe.
41007026	Na umung'inetu yula e Mugiliki, uva ku Silofonike. Neke peamugongole agahumye amasoka kulumwalive.
41007027	Neke Yesu amutigile, “Lekage tasi avana valye pakuva silwinoga pakutegula ichakulya icha avana neke utosekese imbwa.”
41007028	Neke umung'inetu yula amupitule Yesu, “ Ena Mutwa, lwindahihyo, neke imbwa naso sasisava uwuwuluwulu wewawigwa pawulilo wa avana.”
41007029	Neke Yesu peamutigile, “Paulu wibitilage, ilisoka limuhumite umwaliwo!”
41007030	Neke umung'inetu yula abite kukaye neke afike umwana avasise muwuhaga na ilisoka limuhumite.
41007031	Ndawe Yesu ahegige mulutanana lwa mu Tilo, swe igendela ku Sidoni, ndawe afikige ku nyanza ya ku Galilaya igendela mung'i sinyichumi iyitambulwa Dekapoli.
41007032	Neke pevamuletele umunu yeemudibafu kangi munyakibubwi, neke vamusuke amugeleke amawoko.
41007033	Neke Yesu peamutegule palubali uluhuma pa vanu neke avike ifyala fyakwe mumapulikilo neke peafunye amati swe akumupamisa ululimi.
41007034	Ndawe alavige alavige kuchanya sweihuguvala hilo neke amutigile, “Efata,” kwekutigila,“Dibaluke.”
41007035	Neke amapulikilo gakwe gadibaluke, ululimi lwakwe luhogohe, swe ilonga wunofu.
41007036	Neke Yesu avalagile ukutigila valalongela munu; pakulonga ndahihyo ave nda avatumite pakuva pepene pevaginite ukubitakilonga.
41007037	Swe avanu visasavala hilo vitigila, “Apigite mbesili wunofu: avadibalwe avadibafu vapulike, na avanyakibubwi vilonga!”
41008001	Mumisika gijo lula, kwekwina mukong'ano umukomi gwa avanu avevakong'ine neke vave vagaya kinu ichaukulya, Yesu avakemelye avanyigendo vakwe vase kulumwene neke avatigile,
41008002	“Nene nguvawonela ulusungu vamalugu pakuva vave na nene lino filo fidatu, na vagaya chakulya.
41008003	Neke wone ndivaleke vabite na inzala ukwawo vafwa musale mung'asi, avangi vihuma kutaali.”
41008004	Neke avanyigendo vakwe vamupitule, “Lwima ndawuli umunu avalise avanu mbevali iva mubalali umu?”
41008005	Neke Yesu avawuse, “Mwinajo mikate gilinga?” “Vatigee gimufung'ati.”
41008006	Neke Yesu alagile vamalugu vateng'emale pasi. Neke egule imikate igimufung'ati, neke nape alumbite amegwe neke avapele avanyigendo vakwe, sambi vavatengele avanu, nawo swe vakuvasindikila avamalugu.
41008007	Na kangi vevina fisomba fikefu na Yesu peafunlye alaje ulwa na fifila muvasindikile.
41008008	Neke valye swe vakwiguta. Ndawe vasavige uwuwuluwulu fitangula fimufung'ati fimemile.
41008009	Na avanu avalye vevagelaniche mbilima sitayi swe akuvilaga,
41008010	ndawe ahovige ikipugu, umwene na vanyigendo vakwe ibitaga ku lutanana lwa ku Dalumanuta.
41008011	Avafalisayo vaasile vivanga ukwibesa na Yesu. Nawo vamugelige, pakuva vasakige avalagile ikilagilo chekimolelela ukuta ina lulagi ulwihuma kuchanya.
41008012	Neke Yesu ahuguvale hilo munumbula yakwe neke atigile, “Mbi ndawuli, imbegalo iyi yisaka ikilagilo? Nachene nene nguvalongela nyenye kugaya kilagilo chesachusa kumbegelo iyi.”
41008013	Neke Yesu avaleke neke ingile mukipugu swe ilowoka inyanza.
41008014	Ino avanyigendo vevasemilwa ukutegula imikate, vevinago gumwi swe mukipugu.
41008015	Neke Yesu avapavile ukutigila, “Mulavage! Mwikomalilage! na uwuhahu uwa Avafalisayo na Helodi.”
41008016	Neke vavange ukwilonganza ukutigila ngali ilonga ndahihyo pakuva, “Twivagaya mikate.”
41008017	Yesu we akulukagula ulu neke avatigile, “Kumbi ndawuli mukwilonganza ulwa mwivagaya mikate? Simulakikagula nda, simwivasugu, mbi mwivapufi?
41008018	Mwina miho simwilava? Mwina mapulikilo simwipulika? Kangi simwakwiwuka
41008019	nene pendamegwe imikate igihanu kuvanu mbilima sihanu mwategwe fitangula filinga fimemile uwuwuluwulu?” Neke vatigile, “Finyichumi na fivili.”
41008020	“Neke imikate igimufung'ati kuvanu mbilima sitayi fyefitangula filinga ifye fimemile uwuwuluwulu?” Neke vamutigile, “Fimufung'ati.”
41008021	Neke Yesu avatigile, “ Ngali na yilino simulalukagula nangi?”
41008022	Ndawe Yesu afikige ku Betisaida. Neke avanu vamuletele umunu umubofu, swe vakusuka amupamise.
41008023	Neke Yesu amwibate ni liwoko yula umubofu, neke amusindike vahege mukijiji. Swe akumufunyila amati kumiho na ukumugeleka amawoko neke amuwuse, “Ukukiwona kinu?”
41008024	Neke umubofu alave kwilanga neke atigile, “Nguvawona avanu, vinda mibiki gigenda.”
41008025	Neke kangi amugeleke amawoko gakwe mumiho ga yula umubofu ave ilava hilo swe uludali mbeluli lwa ukulavila lwamupiluche ndawe afiwonige mbefili wunofu ndawe wefiwali.
41008026	Swe Yesu ndawe amutigilige abite kukaye ukwawo, akumupavila itigila, “Lemwa kwingila mukijiji!”
41008027	Pambele Yesu na vanyigendo vakwe vahele kufijiji fya ku Kaisaliya Filipi. Na pevali mung'asi, avawusise avanyigendo vakwe, “Avanu vavitigila ulwa nene ndinani?”
41008028	Neke vamulongele ulwa avamwi vavitigila, “Yohane umubatisi, avangi vavitigila Eliya, avangi yumwi va avavisi.”
41008029	Neke Yesu avawuse, “Neke nyenye mwaitigila nene ulwa ndinani?” Petulo amupitwe, “Yeveve Kilisito.”
41008030	Neke avapavile valamulongela munu ing'ani sakwe.
41008031	Ndawe Yesu avangige ukuvigisa avanyigendo vakwe itigila, “Lumuvaje Umwana va Umunu ateseke munzolofu, kangi abihilwa na avavaha na avatambisi avavina na avigisi va indagilo. Nave awulagwa, na pefilutye ifilo fidatu asilibuka.”
41008032	Nave Yesu avalonje wima hela. Nambi Petulo amusindike Yesu palubali swe ivanga ukumukenyela.
41008033	Neke Yesu apitwike akuvalava avanyigendo vakwe, ndawe amukenyelige Petulo itigila, “Hege pa nene ve setani! Pakuva amahosa gako si ga Nguluvi, pesi wina amahosa ga uwunu.”
41008034	Neke Yesu avakemele vamalugu pamwi na vanyigendo vakwe, neke avatigile, “Wone kwina munu yeisaka ukuninila nene lekage ivipile yumwene neke ategule umusalaba gwake neke peaninile nene.
41008035	Pakuva umunu yeyeavesaga isaka ukuwupoka uwumi wakwe yumwene, uyo awuyasa, neke yula yeawuyasa uwumi wakwe ivalwa nene na Ulukani Ulunofu uyo saawupoka.
41008036	Pakuva ambulila kiki umunu na apelwe ing'i mbeyili neke awuyase uwumi wakwe?
41008037	Kangi tutigile umunu mbi atawula kiki chekihalila ku uwumi wakwe?
41008038	Pakuva yeyeavesaga yakumbonela inyoni nene na ing'ani sangu mu mbegalo iyi inzanangifu na iya uwugoni, kwa uyo Umwana uva Umunu saamuwonela inyoni pesaakusa mundolo isa udade pamwi na vanyivaha avelu.”
41009001	Neke Yesu avalongele, “Nachene nene nguvalongela nyenye, povali avanu avimite ipa vesisavafwa wesi valawuwona Uwutwa wa Nguluvi yewusile muludali.”
41009002	Neke pefilutye ifilo fimutanda Yesu avategwe Petulo na Yakobo na Yohane avasindike kukidunda ikitaali viyena. Na pevalikuko we vakumulava, Yesu apitwike ulwihwano lwakwe,
41009003	na gimyenda jakwe jamalavadikige, myelu wuhulo, asukuli umufufi mung'i yahwanite ukwesa ndahihyo.
41009004	Swe, ndawe vaasige Eliya na Musa, vilongana na Yesu.
41009005	Nave Petulo ndawe amulongelige Yesu, “Mutwa, lwinoga hwehwe tusigale baha. Leke tusenge ifitinga fidatu: ikimwi cha veve, ikingi cha Musa, ikingi cha Eliya.”
41009006	Pakuva sialukaguligi ulwa ukulonga, pakuva vevina muhwehwe mukomi.
41009007	Neke ilifufu livagubike, neke iliswi lyahumite mwifufu litigila, “Uyu ye Mwanangu umwende vangu, mumupulikage umwene.”
41009008	Sukumwi hela we pevalava kono na kono sivamuweni munu yungi kangi pesi Yesu hela.
41009009	Na pevisulunuka uluhuma kukidunda avatanie ulwa valalongela munu sevasiwene mbaka Umwana va Umunu peasilibwike uluhuma kuvafwe.
41009010	Swe vakwinatila ululagilo ulo, vakwiwusa vavene ulwa ukusilibuka kuvafwe che kiki.
41009011	Neke pevamuwuse Yesu, “Mbi ndawuli avigisi va indagilo vavitigila mbaka asaage tasi Eliya?”
41009012	Neke avatigile, “Nachene Eliya aasa tasi kukugolola mbesili, neke pamwi na siso Umwana va Umunu andikilwe ndawuli ulwa atesiwa mu nzolofu pamwi na ukubedalwa?
41009013	Ino nguvalongela ulwa Eliya yeeasile neke vamupigile sevawendige avene ndawe lwe andikilwe.”
41009014	Na pevafisile ku vanyigendo avevavalesile vawene ililugu ilikomi livapilime. Na avigisi va indagilo vahele vakwibesa nawo.
41009015	Neke ulusika lulula amalugu mbegali pevamuwene Yesu vasasave hilo, neke vamukimbilile ukumutang'anila vamuhungile.
41009016	Neke Yesu avawuse, “Mbi mukwibesa kiki nawo?”
41009017	Uyumwi va avamalugu amupitwe Yesu, “Ve Mwigisi, ndimuletite umwanangu kwa veve, pakuva ina lisoka ilinyakibubwi.
41009018	Na pelyakumutova lyakumugwisa pasi, na ukuhumya ilifulo mumulomo na ukugelesula amino, na ukukala umuvili mbeguli. Neke ndivasuke avanyigendo vako valihumye valemilwe.”
41009019	Nave Yesu peavapitule, “Nye mbegalo ingaya lufuuwo. Mbi ndikala na nyenye mbaka panili? Mbi ndivakangalila nyenye mbaka panili? Mumulete kwa nene.”
41009020	Neke pevamusindike umunyakilambo yula kwa Yesu. Neke ilisoka pelimuwene Yesu ulusika lulula lyamuletye ililibisi, neke umunyakilambo yula agwe pasi igalangala, kono we lihuma ilifulo mumulomo.
41009021	Neke Yesu amuwuse udade, “Uluhuma panili ina lisoka ili?” Neke udade atigile, “Uluhuma pawana.
41009022	Na mbepali lyakumutoosa mumoto na mululenga sambi limwanange. Neke wone wihwana ukupiga kinu tuwonelage ulusungu ututange!”
41009023	Neke Yesu amutigile, “Wone uve wihwana! Mbesili sasihwana ukupigika kwa yeifuuwa.”
41009024	Ulusika lulula udade va umukwamisi ayofile neke atigile, “Ndifuuwa! Nange uwugaya lufuuwo lwangu.”
41009025	Neke Yesu peawene avamalugu vikimbila vakusa swe akulikenyela ilisoka akulitigila, “Ve lisoka ve munyakibubwi na ve mudibafu, ngukulagila hege kwa uyu na ulapilukila umwingile kangi!”
41009026	Neke pe likoole, limuletele ililibisi ave nda afwe neke pelihege. Neke awolofu vatigile umunyakilambo, “yeafwe!”
41009027	Neke Yesu amwibate iliwoko, neke amukang'ule, swe akwima.
41009028	Neke peinje mukaye, avanyigendo vakwe vamuwuse kukinyele, “Mbi ndawuli hwehwe tulemilwe ukulihumya?”
41009029	Neke avatigile, “Ilisoka ilya de silike lyakuhesa ndahihi pesi kwa lwifunyo hela.”
41009030	Neke Yesu na avanyigendo vakwe vahesile uluhuma pala neke vagendele ku Galilaya. Nave Yesu sawendigi alukagule munu pepwali,
41009031	pakuva avigisige avanyigendo vakwe, akuvatigila, “Umwana va Umunu atawulwa mumawoko ga avanu nawo vamuwulaga; na pevamuwulige pefilutye ifilo fidatu asilibuka.”
41009032	Ino avanyigendo sivalukagwi lwe alongige neke ulwene wogopige pakumuwusa.
41009033	Ndawe vafikige ku Kapelenaumu. Na pealimukaye avawusise, “Mulongige kiki mung'asi?”
41009034	Neke vakatuke pakuva mung'asi vilonganzige ulwa yenani umuvina yealutye mwa veve.
41009035	Neke Yesu ateng'emale swe akuvakemela vala avanyichumi na vavili, neke avatigile, “Yeyeavesaga iwenda ave mulongola kwa mbevali uyo ava va mumbele na mukami va mbevali.”
41009036	Neke amutegule Umwana mudodo, neke amuvike pagatinagati apawo; neke amwegule mumawoko gakwe swe akuvatigila,
41009037	“Yeye amwanukilaga umwana yeindawe uyu mwitawa lyangu akunzanukila nene, na yeakunzanukila nene siakunzanukila nene hela, akumwanukila yula yeanumite nene.”
41009038	Yohane swe akumutigila, “Mwigisi tumuwene umunu yungi ihumya masoka mwitawa lyako neke tumutanile pakuva sivelagi siayiva pamwi na hwehwe.”
41009039	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Mulamutanila, pakuva asukuli yeapiga imiitu mwitawa lyangu neke lulusika lulo alonge imbi kwa nene.
41009040	Pakuva yesiakutubihila hwehwe uyo alilubali lwa hwehwe.
41009041	Pakuva, yeyeavesaga akuvapela nyenye ululenga mu kinywelo ulwa ukunywa pakuva mwivanu vakwe Kilisito sisaaneema ukupelwa uluhombo.”
41009042	“Umunu yeyeavesaga akwambusa uyumwi va avadodo iva avakufuuwa nene apige inzanangifu, ikiba peawopelesewe ulwala musingo neke atooswe mubahali.
41009043	Neke wone iliwoko lyako likukuvase upige inzanangifu, dumule! Ikiba veve pewinje kuwumi we wimugaya liwoko sindawe pe wina mawoko gavili neke sambi utoswe kumoto gwa ku Gehena gwe sigwisimagi. [
41009044	Kula, ifitekenya fyawo sififwisagi, na gumoto sigwisimagi.]
41009045	Neke wone na liligulu likukukuvasa upige inzanangifu, dumule! Ikiba pewinje kuwumi wina ligulu limwi sindawe pe wina magulu gavili neke sambi utoswe kumoto. [
41009046	Kula, ifitekenya fyawo sififwisagi na gumoto sigwisimagi.]
41009047	Neke wone na liliho lyako likukukuvasa upige inzanangifu ikiba peuling'amatwe neke utage! Lunoje wingile ku wutwa wa Nguluvi na liho limwi sindawe pe wina miho gavili neke sambi utoswe kumoto.
41009048	Kula ifitekenya fyawo sififwisagi na gumoto sigwisimagi.
41009049	“Pakuva yeyeavesaga saafungiswa mumoto.
41009050	Umwino munofu, neke wone guhupe gusopwa kiki neke gunone? Nyenye mwinona mwino, mukikalage mu wikalakunoga yinyenye kwa yinyenye.”
41010001	Ndawe Yesu ahegige pala neke abite kulutanana ulwa ku Yudaya na kumwambu ya umukoga gwa ku Yolodani. Neke kangi vamalugu vakong'ane, ndawe Yesu lwealasovye mbepali swe ivanga ukuvigisa.
41010002	Neke Avafalisayo vamusye Yesu sambi vamugele swe vakumuwusa, “Ndawuli lulagile kulumunu ukumuleka uvakwe?”
41010003	Yesu avapitwe, “Musa avalaje ndawuli nyenye?”
41010004	Neke vamutigile, “Musa atigee umunu amulekage uvakwe kwa ukumupela ulwandiko lwa ukulekana sive viva valekine.
41010005	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Wimila uwutalamu wa inumbula senyu nambi Musa aandike ululagilo ulu.
41010006	Neke uluhuma pakugawa avanu, Nguluvi agafile umunyidama na umung'inetu.
41010007	Paulu umunyidama amuleka udade na uyuve neke abaning'ane pamwi na uvakwe.
41010008	Na iwo avavili savava muvili gumwi viva sipevavili kangi nda vave muvili gumwi.
41010009	Neke kila che aluming'ise Nguluvi umunu alakilekasa.”
41010010	Na pevafisile kangi mukaye avanyigendo vamuwusise Yesu kangi ulukani lulula.
41010011	Neke avatigile, “Yeyeamulekaga uvakwe neke ategule yungi, uyo iva mugoni.
41010012	Neke umung'inetu yeakumuleka uvakwe neke agomwe kwa uyungi, apo nave iva mugoni.”
41010013	Avanu vamusindikilage Yesu avana avadodo, ulwa sambi avapamise neke avanyigendo vavakenyele.
41010014	Neke Yesu pealuwene ulu avifile, neke peavatigile, “Muvaleke avadodo vase kwa nene, mulatanila pakuva avana avindawe iva uwutwa wa Nguluvi wawo.
41010015	Nachene, nene nguvalongela nyenye yeyeavesaga siakwanukila Uwutwa wa Nguluvi ndawe umwana mudodo sisaingila kuwutwa wa Nguluvi.”
41010016	Neke peavategule mumawoko gakwe, neke avafunyilile, na ukuvageleka amawoko gakwe.
41010017	Na Yesu peavangige ulugendo umunu uyumwi aasile kikimbila neke amufugamile amuwuse, “Ve mwigisi vemunofu, ngite ndawuli sambi nzingile kuwumi wa mbepali?”
41010018	Neke Yesu amutigile, “Mbi ndawuli ukung'emela ndimunofu? Asukuli umunu umunofu pesi Nguluvi hela yeiyena.
41010019	Ukusikagula indagilo; Ulawulaga, ulava mugoni, ulahisa, ulolelela wudesi, uladeta uvesage na choga kuludado na kuluyuwo.”
41010020	Neke amutigile, “Mwigisi, isi mbesili ndinatye uluhuma pawana wangu.”
41010021	Neke Yesu amulavile swe akumwenda neke amutigile, “Ukepite kinu kimwi hela bite ukaguse mbefili fyewinafyo uvapele avamikaa nayuveve sauva na uwunono kuchanya, neke pewuse uninile nene.”
41010022	Peapulike ulo avifisile se ikumbing'ana ku miho swe ibitaga we avifile pakomi, pakuva ali munono hilo.
41010023	Neke Yesu alave mbekuli mbekuli neke avatigile avanyigendo vakwe, “Saluva lutalamu kwa vala avanono ukwingila ku Wutwa wa Nguluvi.”
41010024	Neke avanyigendo vasasavale ulwa ing'ani sakwe. Neke kangi Yesu avatigile, “Nye vana, sakuva lutalamu wuli ukwingila ku wutwa wa Nguluvi!
41010025	Lupefu ingamiya ukukola mukidwi icha ulusingi neke sindawe umunu umunono ukwingila ku Wutwa wa Nguluvi.”
41010026	Neke vasasavale hilo neke vamutigile, “Mbino ye nani yeahwanite apokwe?”
41010027	Neke Yesu avalavile, neke atigile, “Ku vanu siluhwaniti, neke si kwa Nguluvi nda, pakuva ifinu mbefili fihwanite ukupigika kwa Nguluvi.”
41010028	Petulo neke avange ukumulongela Yesu, “Lavage hwehwe tufilesile mbefili neke tukuninile veve!”
41010029	Yesu atigee, “Nachene, nene nguvalongela nyenye, asukuli umunu yeailesile ikaye, nave vanyalukolo vakwe, nave avahase, nave uyuve, nave udade, nave avana, nave gimigunda ukwimila ilitawa lyangu na Ulukani Ulunofu.
41010030	yesisaanukila kanyigana ulwalino, ikaye na avanyalukolo vakwe na vahase na vayuve na vana na gimigunda pamwi nasi neseko, neke pambele uwumi wa mbepali na mbepali.
41010031	Neke awolofu avalongola savalava vamumbele neke avamumbele savalava valongola.”
41010032	Na pevali mulugendo, vasogwe ku Yelusalemu, Yesu alalongwe, neke vasasavale, nawo avamuninilige vave na muhwehwe. Neke avategule palubali avanyichumi na vavili kangi, swe ivanga Ukuvalongela lula uluwoneka kulumwene,
41010033	itigila, “Mulavage, tusogwe ku Yelusalemu, neke Umwana va Umunu atawulwa ku vatambisi avavina na avigisi va indagilo, nawo vamuhiga sambi awulagwe, na ukumutawula kwa avamyanza.
41010034	Nawo vamwelanga, vamufunyila amati, vamutova na imikungo iminyamifwa na ukumuwulaga, neke pefilutye ifilo fidatu asilibuka.”
41010035	Neke Yakobo na Yohane, avana va Sebedayo, vabite kwa Yesu neke vamutigile, “Mwigisi hwehwe twisaka utupigile chechekivesaga chetukusuka veve.”
41010036	Neke avatigile, “Mwisaka nene ndivapigile kiki?”
41010037	Neke vamutigile, “Lekage hwehwe tuteng'emale, uyumwi kwiwoko lyako lya kundyo neke uyumwi kwiwoko lyako ilya kung'igi, mundolo sako.”
41010038	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Simukukikagula che mwisuka! muhwanite ukunywela ikinywelo cha uluteseko chenywela nene nave uwubatiso wendibatisiwa nene?”
41010039	Neke vamutigile, “Tuhwanite.” Neke Yesu avatigile, “Ikinywelo chendandinywela nene munywela, na uwubatiso wendibatisiwa nene, nayi nyenye mubatisiwa.
41010040	Neke ulwa ukuteng'emala kuliwoko lyangu lya kundyo nave ilya kung'igi ulo si lwa nene ukuvapela, Ulo lwa vala avavikile.”
41010041	Neke vala avanyichumi peyevapulike swe vivanga ukuvavipila va Yakobo na Yohane.
41010042	Neke Yesu swe akuvakemela, neke avatigile, “Mukulukagula ulwa ukutigila vala avavikagulanika ulwa vatema mu vamyanza vavitema kwa ludali na avavina vawo vakuvavika avanu muwuvanda.
41010043	Ino sisaluva ndahihyo kwa nyenye, pakuva yeisaka ave muvina mwa nyenye ava mukami venyu.
41010044	Neke yeava mulongola mwa nyenye ava mukami va mbemuli.
41010045	Pakuva nayu Mwana va Umunu siasili apigilwage, pesi apigilage, na ukutawula uwumi wakwe sambi luve luhombo lwa awolofu.
41010046	Neke vafike ku Yeliko, nave Yesu pealutilige mu Yeliko pamwi avanyigendo vakwe na vamalugu, Batimayo, yeali mubofu umususi, umwana va Timayo, eateng'eme palubali pa ng'asi.
41010047	Neke peapulike ulwa ye Yesu uva ku Nasaleti, avanzile ukukoola itigila, “Yesu ve Mwana va Daudi, umbonelage ulusungu nene!”
41010048	Neke awolofu vamukenyele, akatuke, neke umwene aginite ukukoola hilo, “Ve Mwana va Daudi umbonelage ulusungu nene!”
41010049	Swe Yesu akwima neke atigile, “Mumukemele.” swe akumukemela umubofu na ukumutigila, “Wikangase! Wime, akukukemela.”
41010050	Neke atage isopeka yakwe, swe idibuka ibita kwa Yesu.
41010051	Neke Yesu amutigile, “Wisaka ngupigile kiki veve?” Neke umubofu amutigile Yesu, “Mutwa ngukusuka ndave.”
41010052	Neke Yesu amutigile, “Wibitilage, ulufuuwo lwako lukuponise.” Na ulusika lulula swe ilava na ukumuninila Yesu kwe abitige.
41011001	Pevahegelye ku Yelusalemu vafikite na muboma isa Betifage na Betaniya, mwivambala lya ikidunda icha imiseituni. Kula Yesu avatumite avavili va avanyigendo vakwe,
41011002	avatigee, “Mubitage mbaka kukijiji chemulaving'ine. Na pemukwingila mukijiji, muyifika idogovi minge yesiyeyilahowa na munu. Mwawulage mulete,
41011003	neke wone umunu avawuse ukutigila, ‘Nyela mbi ndawuli mwigita de?’ Mumutigilage, ‘Umutwa ina kipigo nayo na neke kangi ayipilula baha.’ ”
41011004	Vahele mung'asi swe vakuyiwona idogovi minge pivala pa mulyango gwa ikaye. Swe vakwawula.
41011005	Avanu avamwi avevimile uko swe vakuvatigila, “Mbi ndawuli mukwawula idogovi iyo?”
41011006	Swe vakuvapitula ndawe Yesu lwe alavalonje nawo swe vakuvatawula.
41011007	Nawo vayisindike idogovi kwa Yesu, vitandika imyenda jawo pachanya pa idogovi swe Yesu ihova.
41011008	Avanu wolofu vatandike imyenda jawo mung'asi, na avamwi vadumwe amatagala ga imibiki ukuhuma mumigunda na ukutandika mung'asi.
41011009	Na vala ave valongwe na ava mumbele, vavanzile ukuyova vitigila, “Hosana! Mufunyilile yula ye akusa mwitawa lya Nguluvi!
41011010	Wufunyilile Uwutwa we wukusa wa Udadetu Daudi Hosana kuchanya hilo!”
41011011	Yesu avelige ifika mu Yelusalemu, inje mu Tembeli, ndawe alavige imbali mbesili. Na pekive kinyamihye, awukite swe ibita ku Betaniya na avanyigendo vanyichumi na vavili.
41011012	Na ikimunyi icha kavili lwevahumige ku Betaniya inzala yavafile.
41011013	Neke aguwone kwa kutaali umusombe ugunya mahamba. Ahele sambi angule amaveleko mumusombe, na avelige ihegelela sakiweni kinu pe si gamahamba hela kangi silwe lusika lwa amaveleko.
41011014	Swe Yesu akugutigila, “Uluhuma lino kwa veve mbaka mbepali pagaya munu yesa alya amaveleko uluhuma kwa veve.” Avanyigendo vakwe vapulike ulo.
41011015	Vavelige vifike ku Yelusalemu, Yesu inje mu Tembeli, swe ivanga ukuvahaka mbevali vevagusige na ukugula mula mu tembeli. Swe idulika inyaaga sawo avakowoka amagobole na ifigoda fya avasulusi va ingunda.
41011016	Samulekiti munu asave nambi ikinu uluhuma pala pa tembeli.
41011017	Neke avange ukuvigisa avanu ukutigila, “Mbi silwandike mu Waandike Uwelu ulwa, ‘Itembeli yangu yiva kaye ya kwifunyo lwa avanu mbevali va ing'i mbesili!’ Neke lino nyenye mudulike yive lifinga lya vahiisi!”
41011018	Avatambisi avavina na avigisi va indagilo, pevapulike iso neke vavange ukusaka ifigaho sambi vamuwulage neke ulwene wogopige pakuva mbevali vasasavalige seigisige.
41011019	Na lyavelige lisota ilisuva Yesu na vanyigendo vakwe vahegite pala pa boma.
41011020	Pamilawu pevalutilige, vaguwene umusombe gula gukasile na sindela.
41011021	Petulo agwiwike umusombe gula, neke amutigile Yesu, “Mwigisi, lavage! Umusombe gula gwe ukagufingulise yegukasile!”
41011022	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Mumufuuwage Nguluvi.
41011023	Nachene, nguvalongela, umunu yeyeavesaga na ulufuuwo ahwanite ukutigila ikidunda iki, ‘Kimuke ipo bite ukitoose kunyanza!’ Wone alonge wesiisina munumbula yakwe, we ifuuwa ukuta lweilonga, lugendela mumo, nachene lupigika ndahihyo.
41011024	Ino nene nguvalongela nyenye, chechemusukaga mukwifunya mufuuwagwe ukuta yemwanuche icho, nacho kiva chenyu.
41011025	Na pepemuvelaga mwimile mukwifunya, mudegepelage, wone mwina lukani na munu yungi; sambi udadenyu nave yealikuchanya ahwane ukuvadegepela nyenye inzanangifu senyu. [
41011026	Neke wone nyenye muve simwidegepela avangi inzanangifu sawo, nayu dadenyu yeali kuchanya savadegepela nyenye inzanangifu senyu.”]
41011027	Neke pevafikite ku Yelusalemu, na Yesu peagendige mu Tembeli avatambisi avavina na avigisi va indagilo na avavina va avanu neke vamubitile Yesu,
41011028	swe vakumutigila, “Mbi kwa lulagi luki wipiga isi? Nave ye nani yeakupelye ululagi upige isi?”
41011029	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Nayi nene ndivawusa lukani, wone mumitule nayinene ndivalongela kwa lulagi na ludali lwa nani ndipiga isi mbesili.
41011030	Mundongele, uwubatiso wa Yohane wahumite kwa Nguluvi apangi kwa avanu? Mumitule.”
41011031	Swe vivanga ukwilonganza vavene, “Vitigila, ‘Wone tutigile wahumite kwa Nguluvi’, atutigila, ‘Lino mbi ndawuli simwamufuuvitwi?’
41011032	Na kangi wone tutigile, ‘Wahumite ku vanu” (Wogwipe avanu pakuva mbevali valukagulige ukuta Yohane ali muvisi nachene.)
41011033	Swe vakumupitula Yesu, vakumutigila, “Situluseli.” Neke Yesu avatigile, “Nayi nene sindivalongela nyenye kwa lulagi na ludali lwa nani nene ndipiga isi mbesili.”
41012001	Neke Yesu avanzile ukulonga nawo kwa ifiganiso, “Epwali umunu yealalimite umugunda gwa imisabibu, isitila ulusito umugunda mbeguli. Neke awuyape apono pawuhusilo wa amaveleko ga imisabibu, neke awuyape na chuwo. Swe akuvalekela avalimi imigunda neke peawuke ulugendo.
41012002	Ulusika lwavelige lwifika ulwa ukwangula amaveleko, atumite umukami vakwe abite kwa vala avanyakubasa, akategule amaveleko amuletele.
41012003	Vala vamwibete, neke vamutove, na ukumuhumya mu mugunda we mugaya kinu.
41012004	Neke kangi atume umukami yungi; swe nave vakumuvayula lweya mumutwe na ukumupigila imbi.
41012005	Umunyamugunda amutumite yungi kangi, uyo vamuwulige na avangi avaasige vavapigile ndahihyo, avamwi vavatofile na avamwi vavawulige.
41012006	Ino alasigise umunu yumwi hela, umwanakwe umwende vakwe. Uyo nave pambele amutumite itigila, ‘Uyu apamwinga vamwogopa pakuva muswamuvangu.’
41012007	Neke vala avanyakubasa umugunda valongane vavene ng'ani, ‘Uyu ye munya lilila lya umugunda, ino lekage tumuwulage, na ililila live lyetu!’
41012008	Swe vakumwibata, vakumuwulaga, vakumutosa kwivala uluhuma pa mugunda gwa imisabibu.
41012009	“Lino yula umunyamugunda avagita ndawuli? Saasa avasinde avanyakubasa umugunda, na umugunda ugo gwa imisabibu saavabasikisa avangi.
41012010	Mbi ndawuli nyenye Uwandike uwu simwemulimba? ‘Iliganga lila lyevalibihye avasenzi, ilyo live liganga likomi lya mulubali.
41012011	Ulukani ulu luhumite kwa Umutwa, nalo wuhulo pamiho getu.
41012012	Avatambisi avavina, avigisi va indagilo na avavaha valukagwe ukuta ikiganiso icho avaselengige avene. Nambi vagahige ukumwibata, neke ulwene vawogopige vamalugu. Swe vakumuleka, swe vakwibitilaga.
41012013	Swe vakuvatuma kwa Yesu Avafalisayo na Avahelode, sambi vamugwilise Yesu mu ng'ani sakwe.
41012014	Neke vamubitile vamutigile, “Mwigisi, tukulukagula ukutigila veve wi munu wimulongela mumwene, na siwakwogopa uwuvina wa munu. Pakuva siwawilava uwusu wa umunu wakwigisa mumwene ulukani lwa Nguluvi. Lino witigila ndawuli lunoje tuhombe imbemenenge kwa Kaisali apangi nda?” Tutawulage, tulatawula?
41012015	Nave, we akulukagula ukutigila vabuganisi, swe Yesu akuvatigila, “Mbi ndawuli nyenye mukungela? Mlete iligobole ndave.”
41012016	Swe vakumusindikila. Neke avalongele uwusu uwu na ilitawa ili lya nani?” Neke vamutigile, “Lya Kaisali.”
41012017	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Mumupelage Kaisali ifya Kaisali na ifya Nguluvi mumupelage Nguluvi.” Swe visasavala hilo.
41012018	Neke Avasadukayo avitigila kugaya ulusilibuko vahele kwa Yesu, neke vamuwuse,
41012019	“Mwigisi, Musa atwandiche ululagi ulwitigila: ‘Wone umunu afwe amuleke uvakwe mugaya mwana, umunyalukolo va yula yeafwe amutegulage yula umufwile sambi amwegalile yula yeafwe avana.’
41012020	Lino vepovali avanu vimufung'ati avegalwa pamwinga. Umuvina ategwe umung'inetu, neke afwe we mugaya mwana.
41012021	Umunyalukolo va kavili nave amutegwe yula umung'inetu, nave afwe wesalekiti mwana; na uva wudatu nave ndahihyo.
41012022	Na mbevali ndawe vimufung'ati vamulekite yula umung'inetu mugaya mwana. Pambele nayu ng'inetu yula aafwe.
41012023	Lino pa ikimunyi cha ukusilibuka avanu mbevali uluhuma mufwa, umung'inetu uyo saava mukina nani? Pakuva mbevali ndawe vimufung'ati vevamutegwe.”
41012024	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Nyenye mwiyaga pakomi, pakuva simuwuseli uwandike uwelu na uludali lwa Nguluvi.
41012025	Pakuva vevafwe pevave vasilibwike sivitegulagi nambi kugomwa; vaviva vihwana vanyivaha va kuchanya.
41012026	Na ulo lwa avanu ukusilibuka mbi simwemulimba mukitabu cha Musa pa mulyango gwa ikisaka chechakige umoto? Nguluvi amulonje Musa ukutigila, ‘Nene ndi Nguluvi va Abulahamu, Nguluvi va Isaki na Nguluvi va Yakobo.’
41012027	Lino umwene si Nguluvi va avafwe nda, umwene Nguluvi va awumi. Nyenye mwiyaga pakomi.”
41012028	Uyumwi va avigisi va indagilo afikite neke apulike lwevakwibesa. Avelige ipulika ulwa Yesu avapitwe wunofu, nave ahele amuwuse Yesu, “Mundagilo mbesili ululutye lulikwi?”
41012029	Neke Yesu amutigile, “Lwa ukutala lwe ulu: ‘Pulikage veve Isilaeli! Nguluvi vetu ye Nguluvi yeiyena.
41012030	Nayuveve mwendage Nguluvi vako munumbula yako mbeyili, na mu umutima gwako mbeguli, na mu uluhala lwako mbeluli na mu uludali lwako mbeluli.’
41012031	Na ulwa kavili lwe ulu, ‘Mwendage umuyago ndawe inumbula yako yiveve.’ Pagaya ululagi ulungi, ulukomi lwelulutye kwa isi.”
41012032	Swe yula umwigisi va indagilo akumutigila, “Nachene ulonje mumwene ukutigila Nguluvi iyena, pagaya yungi pesi yumwene hela.
41012033	Na ukumwenda kwa inumbula yako mbeyili, na kwa uluhala lwako mbeluli na kwa uludali lwako mbeluli na umuyago ndawe inumbula yako yuveve, ulukani ulo lwelulutye ku fitawulwa na inambika mbesili.”
41012034	Nave Yesu avelige akumuwona ukuta alonzile kwa luhala, swe akumutigila, “Veve siulipataali na uwutwa wa Nguluvi.” Uluhuma baho, pagaya umunu yeigelye ukumuwusa kangi Yesu lukani.
41012035	Neke Yesu pe akwingila mu Tembeli. Avawusise, “Mbi ndawuli avigisi va indagilo vavitigila Kilisito Mwana va Daudi?
41012036	Kono Daudi yumwene peilongoswa na Umuhe Umwelu atigee: ‘Umutwa atigee kulumutwa vangu. Teng'emale kuliwoko lyangu ilya kundyo, mbaka pendivaletite avatavangu vako pamagulu gako.’
41012037	“Umwene Daudi akumukemela Mutwa. Lino luva ndawuli ave kangi Mwanakwe?” Neke ililugu ilya avanu vamupulikisige kwa luhekelelo.
41012038	Neke Yesu avalongele peakuvigisa, “Mwikomalilage na avigisi va indagilo, aviwendaga ukugenda vafwite isopeka inaali sa ulutogo, na ukuhungilwa mumakasi,
41012039	na ukwikala pawulongolo mumasinagogi na mufigoda ifya muwulongolo mumbungo.
41012040	Vakuvawonela avang'inetu avafwile, nu kutegula ifinu fyawo, kono we vakuvabuganisa nu kwifunya lusika, iwo savahigwa pakomi ukulutila.”
41012041	Nave Yesu alikalite pipi na pala pevisopaga ifitawulwa, mu kinyawugali cha mu tembeli avawene avanu lilugu visopa ifitawulwa. Avanono vasopige amagobole molofu.
41012042	Aasile umung'inetu yungi, mufwile, kangi mumikaa, uyo asopite amagobole makefu wita figobole fivili hela.
41012043	Neke Yesu avatigile, avanyigendo vakwe, ukutigila, “Nachene nguvalongela uyu umufwile umumikaa atawe ukulutila mbevali avatawe ifitawulwa mukinyawugali.
41012044	Pakuva avangi mbevali vasopite ifinu fyefivalutye uwolofu, neke uyu umung'inetu umumikaa, muwumikaa wakwe atawe mbefili fyeakalinafyo, na fyeakalaahuvye.”
41013001	Na Yesu avelige ihuma mu Tembeli uyumwi va vanyigendo vakwe amutige, “Mwigisi, lavage amaganga na ikaye isi wesiwali uwunofu.”
41013002	Yesu amupitwe, neke amulongele, “Ukusiwona ikaye ingomi isi? sipolili nambi iliganga limwi mukaye isi lyesisalidenywa.”
41013003	Ino Yesu pealateng'eme pa kidunda icha imiseituni alaving'ine na itembeli, Petulo, na Yakobo, Yohane na Andeleya vamuwusise Yesu palubali,
41013004	“Tulongele, ing'ani isi panili pesasiwoneka? Na kiki chekiva kilagilo ukuta ulusika ulo yesambi lwikwila?”
41013005	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Mwikomalilage, umunu alavasanga.
41013006	Pakuva avanu wolofu savasa mwitawa lyangu, vitigila, ‘Nene ye nene!’ Nawo savavasanga wolofu.
41013007	Pesamwipulika ulwa amagalu na simwepo sa amagalu, mulakabuka. Pakuva iso sasusa, neke umudugo guva sigulafika.
41013008	Ing'i sayiwuka ukwihoma na ing'i yingi, na uwutwa ukwihoma na uwutwa uwungi; sakuva na ifitulo pono na pono, sakuva na ikinge. Iso mbesili gwemuvango gwa ukuteseka ndawe umung'inetu peakwivikula.
41013009	“Nayi nyenye mwikomalilage inumbula senyu. Pakuva savavasindika nyenye pawuhigilo, na mumasinagogi sambi mutowe, samusindikwa ku vatema na avatwa sambi muhigwe pemwivalwa ilitawa lyangu, sambi muve wolelesi kwa avene.
41013010	Neke pesilulava ulo. Ulukani Ulunofu sa ludalikwa tandi kuvanu mbevali.
41013011	Nawo pevavibete nyenye na ukuvasindika pawuhigilo, mulahwa kihosa chemulonga, pakuva samupelwa icha ukulonga na Umuhe Umwelu.
41013012	Umunyalukolo amupituka umunyalukolo vakwe awulagwe; udade amupituka umwana; na avana vavagalukila avavaha vawo na ukuvawulaga.
41013013	Avanu mbevali savavavipila nyenye, vakuvavala ilitawa lyangu. Neke yula yeyeavesaga akange mbaka pamudugo uyo yesaapokwa.
41013014	“Neke pemuluwene ‘Uluvifyo ulwa Uwanangifu’ lulipe sipapene. (Ye akwimba alukagulage!) ipo avanu ve vali ku Yudaya vakimbililage mufidunda.
41013015	Umunu ye alikwiking'a lya ikaye aliika mukaye yakwe ategule kinu.
41013016	Na ye ali kumugunda alapiluka kukaye akategule umwenda gwakwe.
41013017	Neke vinalyo vala vesavava na ifilo na vala vesavakoosa mufilo ifyo!
41013018	Mwifunyage kwa Nguluvi sambi ulusika ulo, lulemwa ukuva pa ikitungwi.
41013019	Pakuva ukuguda kwa ifilo ifyo sakulava kubi ukulutila, uluhuma ukugawa ing'i mbaka ku lino de, ukuguda uko sikwekulawoneka, na sisakuwoneka kangi nangi.
41013020	Na wone Nguluvi akalaleke ukufikepula ifilo ifyo, asupali umunu yeakalapokwa. Lino ukwimila avahagule vakwe, Nguluvi akepwise ifilo ifyo.
41013021	“Neke lino, wone umunu avatigile, ‘Mulavage Kilisito ali ipa!’ ‘Na vavatigile ali kula’ mulafuuwa ulo.
41013022	Pakuva savawoneka wolofu vesavitigila vavene ve Kilisito va wudesi na avavisi va uwudesi nawo savapiga ifilagilo na uwuhulo, sambi vavayase wone luhwane na vavahagule.
41013023	Neke nyenye mwikomalilage. Pakuva nene yendivalonje mbesili wesisilava siwoneka.
41013024	“Neke ifilo ifyo, ukuguda pekulutye, ilisuva salipituka live lwisa, na gumwesi sisaguvala nangi.
41013025	Na ing'eng'esi sasigwa uluhuma kwilanga, na ludali ulwa kuchanya nalo saluhogoleka.
41013026	Ipo pesavamuwona Umwana va Umunu akusa mumafufu mu ludali ulukomi na indolo.
41013027	Nave saavatuma vanyivaha vakwe vavakong'ase; avahagule vakwe, uluhuma imbali mbesili isitayi konivala, uluhuma pawudugo wa ing'i mbaka uwudugo wa kuchanya.
41013028	“Ukukola umusombe mwiyigisage ikiganiso iki: Pembe muwone matagala ga imisombe gavanzile ukutopola amahamba, mulukagulage ukutigila ikifuku yekihegelye.
41013029	Lwindahihyo pemusiwene ing'ani mbesili yesiwonike, mulukagulage ukutigila Umwana va Umunu yeahegelye mumilyango.
41013030	Nachene nene nguvalongela, imbegalo iyi siyilutila mbaka ing'ani iso mbesili peyesikwilye.
41013031	Ing'i na kuchanya safilutila, neke ing'ani sangu mbesili sisasilutila nangi.
41013032	“Neke ikimunyi na ikivalilo asukuli yeakisele; nambi vanyivaha ava kuchanya nambi Umwana; pesi Dada hela yeiyena.
41013033	Mwikomalilage mwikale miho, pakuva simukiseli ikimunyi icho kilava panili.
41013034	Lwihwana nu umunu yeisaka ukuwuuka ulugendo yeakuyileka yeailesile ikaye yakwe neke avalagile na ukuvagavila ifipigo avakami vakwe, na ukumulongela yula munyakugosa yula umwimilisi va umulyango ikalage miho.
41013035	Lino mwikalage miho, pakuva simukiseli ikimunyi icha umunyakaye cheasila; ukutigila yilava pamihye, pakilo, apamwinga yilava mukilo mwilangali, kangi apamwi munzogolo mwesivika, nambi pamilawu.
41013036	Mwikalage miho alonga ase avatinukise afike mugonelye tulo.
41013037	Na isi senguvalongela nyenye, ndilongela na avangi mbevali ukutigila: Mwikalage miho!”
41014001	Lino yefyefisige filo fivili hela ukufika ikimunyi ikikomi icha i Pasaka na ikimunyi cha imikate je simihate uwuhahu. Avatambisi avavina na avigisi va indagilo vasakige ikigaho icha ukumwibata Yesu kwa kinyele sambi vamuwulage.
41014002	Neke vatigile, “Tulamwibata ukumwibata pa ikimunyi ikikomi, valonga avanu vatugalukile.”
41014003	Yesu ahele ku Betaniya neke peali mukaye ya Simoni umutamwa uwukoma, ateng'eme pawulilo ilya, aasile umung'inetu yeakolye mumawoko gakwe ikisupa icha amafuta amanyakunung'ila wunofu kangi gamagobole molofu, swe akumuhululisa Yesu mumutwe gwakwe.
41014004	Neke avanu avangi avebaho vavifile, vitigila, “Mbi ndawuli akwihesigila amafuta agindawe iga?
41014005	Pakuva amafuta agindawe iga gake gagusiwa ukulutila magobole magana gadatu, neke vapelwe avamikaa!” Neke vamulonge fivi umung'inetu yula.
41014006	Neke Yesu avatigile, “Mumuleke; mbi ndawuli mukumufwahisa? Amije lukani lunofu.
41014007	Pakuva avamikaa mwinawo mbepali, muhwanite ukuvatanga ulusika lulweluvesaga pemuwendite ukuvapigila wunofu. Neke nene si mba na nyenye mbepali.
41014008	Umung'inetu uyu apigite lweawene lumuvaje alupige, agubakite umuvili gwangu amafuta amanofu angelanise nene ulwa ukutagwa kwangu.
41014009	Nachene nene nguvalongela, bahaludalikwaga Ulukani Ulunofu mung'i mbeyili ndita na lulu lweapigite uyu salutambulwa kwa ukumwiwuka.”
41014010	Swe Yuda Isikalyote, uyumwi va vala vanyichumi na vavili, ahele kwa avatambisi avavina sambi amupituke Yesu kwa avene.
41014011	Avatambisi avavina vavelige vipulika ulo neke vahekelele hilo, vamuhuvise ukumupela amagobole. Swe Yuda ivanga ukusaka ikilega na ulusika ulunofu sambi amupituke Yesu.
41014012	Ikimunyi cha ukutala cha ikimunyi ikikomi cha imikate je simihate uwuhahu, ipo pepene peyayidumulwa ing'olo ya Pasaka, avanyigendo vakwe vamuwusise vitigila, “Kwiyaga kwewiwenda tukakugelanikise ichakulya cha i Pasaka?”
41014013	Swe Yesu akuvatuma avanyigendo vakwe vavili akuvatigila, “Mubite muboma, na mumo mwitang'ana munu yumwi ategwe ikisilo cha ululenga mumufwatage yuyo,
41014014	mbaka mukaye yeasakwingila, umo mumulongelage umunyakaye ukutigila, ‘Umwigisi itigila: ikaye ya avagenzi ndile i Pasaka na avanyigendo vangu?’
41014015	Nave avalagila ibwalo ingomi pachanya mbuyape wunofu. Ipo pemugelasage ichakulya.”
41014016	Avanyigendo vavelige vibita muboma, vafikite ndawe Yesu weavalonje. Swe vigelanisa i Pasaka.
41014017	Chavelige kifika ikinyamiyhe, Yesu aasile pamwinga na vanyigendo vakwe vanyichumi na vavili.
41014018	Na peviva pawulilo vilya, Yesu avalonje ukutigila, “Nachene nene nguvalongela, uyumwinga va nyenye amituka.”
41014019	Swe vivanga ukuhuguvala, na ukumuwusa yumwi yumwi, “Napo ye nene?”
41014020	Neke Yesu, avatigile, “Uyumwi va nyenye vanyichumi na vavili, yeilila inonge na nene mukinyandilo.
41014021	Pakuva Umwana va Umunu akwibitilaga ndawe lweandikilwe, neke inalyo umunu yula yeakumupituka Umwana va Umunu! Luke luva ikiba umunu uyo alaleke ukuwoneka!”
41014022	Na lwevalisige pala pawulilo, Yesu inwe umukate, swe ifunyilila, swe imegula swe akuvapela itigila, “Mukote ugu gwe muvili gwangu.”
41014023	Neke peinule ikinywelo swe ilumba, swe akuvapela; swe vinywela mbevali kicho.
41014024	Swe akuvatigila, “Iyi ye danda yangu ya ulufingano, yeyikwitika ukwimila awolofu.
41014025	Nachene nguvalongela nyenye sindilagele kangi nywe umuveleko gwa umusabibu mbaka ikimunyi kila chesanywa umupya kuwutwa wa Nguluvi.”
41014026	Neke baho vavelige vakwimba ulwimbo, sweno vihuma vibita kukidunda cha imiseituni.
41014027	Yesu avalonje ukutigila, “Mbemuli nyenye mung'imbila ikilo icha neng'ino, pakuva lwandike: ‘Ndimutova umukwamila ng'olo, nasing'olo sitagalila.’
41014028	Neke peyesilibwike, sandongola ukubita ku Galilaya.”
41014029	Petulo amutigile, “Nambi mbevali vakumbihila veve nu kukuleka, nene singubihila nda!”
41014030	Nachene ngukulongela, “Ikilo iki, inzogolo wesiyilavika ulwakavili, veve uva ung'anite kadatu.”
41014031	Neke Petulo awile ukwilapa, “Na lumbagile ukufwilasa na veve nambi ndahihyo singukana nda.” Na vanyigendo mbevali valonzile ndahihyo.
41014032	Swe vavelige vifika apono apitambulwa Getisemane. Yesu avatige avanyigendo vakwe, “Mwikale baha nene pengwifunya.”
41014033	Neke avategule Petulo, Yakobo na Yohane; swe ivanga ukuhuguvala munumbula.
41014034	Swe akuvalongela, “Nene nyuguve hilo munumbula ngwenda fwe, mwikalage baha kono we mwimiho.”
41014035	Swe ibita pawutalo ludodo swe igwa panyi kinyalileme, neke avange ukwifunya ulwa, wone luke luhwane, alemwe ukwingila mu kivalilo cha uluteseko.
41014036	Neke atigile, “Dada vangu, kwa mbesili sasihwana. Nyesekese ikinywelo iki cha uluteseko ulu ulwene salulava ndawe lwendiwenda nene. Ulwa luvelage ndawe lwewiwenda veve.”
41014037	Avelige ipiluka ku vanyigendo vakwe avadatu, avafikite vagonelye tulo. Swe akumuwusa Petulo, “Simoni! Mbi ugonelye? Ulemilwe pakwikala miho nave kivalilo kimwi?”
41014038	Swe akuvalongela, “Mwikalage miho mwifunye sambi mulemwe ukwingila mu kugelwa. Inumbula yiwenda neke umuvili gwina muhwehwe.”
41014039	Ahele kangi kukwifunya ipilukila ing'ani sisila.
41014040	Neke apiluke kangi, avafike vagonelye. Pakuva amiho gawo gegatimbite na tulo valemilwe ukumupitula nambi lukani.
41014041	Avelige akuvasila ulwa wudatu avatigee, “Pemugonelye tulo nu kusuupa? Lino lukwilye! Ulusika yelufikite! Umwana va Umunu ukutawulwa mumawoko ga vanu avanyanzanangifu.
41014042	Muwuke, tubitage. Mulavage yula umunyakumituka yeahegelye.”
41014043	Ino Yesu we pealonga, Yuda yula uyumwi va vala avanyichumi na vavili, afikite na ililugu lya avanu vakolye amamage na ifisonzo. Avanu avevatumitwe na avatambisi avavina, na avigisi va indagilo na avavina va avanu.
41014044	Yula Yuda umunyakumupituka Yesu yee avapelye ikilagilo: itigila, “Yula yendimunonela yemwene, yemwibatage na ukumutegula wunofu.”
41014045	Yuda avelige ifika hela, ahele kwa Yesu agolwike, na ukumutigila, “Mwigisi!” Swe akumunonela.
41014046	Swe avanu vakumwibata Yesu, vakumupinga.
41014047	Uyumwi va vala veve vimise na Yesu, ategwe ilimage lyakwe swe akumuputa ilipulikilo umukami va Umutambisi Umuvina.
41014048	Yesu avatigee, “Mbi ndawuli, musile mukolye mamage na ifisonzo mukundibata nene witigila ndimuhiisi?
41014049	Mbepali ndavesige na nyenye mu tembeli ngwigisa, na simwandibatigi. Leke luve sambi Uwandike Uwelu wukwilye.”
41014050	Swe avanyigendo vakwe mbevali vikimbila vakumuleka iyena.
